Title: Get Season Pro free for 7 days
Content:
As a new customer, or an existing DAZN subscriber you can now get a free 7-day trial of our complete NFL Game Pass product – including all the matches, extended highlights, Game in 40, and the All-22 series.

How do I sign up? 
You can sign up and start watching right now – if you’re already a DAZN subscriber just click here to sign up for your NFL free trial.  

If you’re new to DAZN you can sign up for the free trial here - you won’t be charged until the trial period is over. 

Can I pay in installments after the free trial? 
The Season Pro package will be charged on day 8, for the full amount. If you want to pay in 4 installments, you can do so by cancelling your free trial on day 7 and then signing up for NFL Game Pass to be paid in installments here.

How can I stop the free trial? 
You can cancel the free trial at any point in the 7 days and payment won’t be taken for the Season Pro pass. To do so, please visit ‘My Account’ and go to the subscription section. After you’ve cancelled, you’ll still be able to continue watching for the rest of the day.

Title: Where is DAZN available?
Content: DAZN is currently available in Brazil, Germany, Spain, Austria, Italy, USA, Switzerland, Canada and Japan.

Title: How do I sign up for DAZN?
Content:
Please choose below how you would like to sign up for DAZN:
  • Sign up using your web browser
  • Sign up using your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV
  • Sign up using your Android phone, or tablet
  • Sign up using your Amazon device
  • Sign up using your Smart TV, or Gaming console
  • What to do if you run into problems during sign up

Sign up for DAZN using your web browser (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN account using your web browser:
  • On the DAZN homepage click on "Sign up"
  • Next you will need to enter your personal details for your account. Please make sure to double check your email address. Once you have entered all your details, click on continue.
  • Once you click on continue you will access the payment page. If you have a gift code available make sure to enter this first and click on “apply”. You will get a notification that your gift has been successfully redeemed
  • Afterwards choose your preferred payment method and enter your payment details.
  • Click on "Start Subscription" which will bring you to a payment overview page.
  • Congratulations, you have successfully subscribed to DAZN.

Sign up for DAZN using your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN Account on your Apple device:
  • On your iPhone/iPad home screen start your DAZN app
  • Click on the Sign up button
  • Fill out your personal information for your Account and click on "Start Watching"
  • Confirm your payment via iTunes for your DAZN account
  • Please note that you can access DAZN on any device using your DAZN credentials created

Sign up using your Android phone, or tablet (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN account using your web browser:
  • On your Android phone, or tablet home screen start your DAZN app
  • Click on the Sign up button
  • Fill out your personal information for your account and click on "Start Watching"
  • You will get a summary page where you need to confirm your payment.
  • A pop up window will open, where you need to confirm your payment via Google Play Billing. Once this is confirmed your account was successfully created.
  • Please note that you can access DAZN on any device using your DAZN credentials created
Sign up for DAZN using your Amazon device (back to top)
To sign-up with your Amazon device you must be located in Japan, Germany, Austria or Canada. Your 1-Click Payment Method must also correspond to the same country you are accessing DAZN from. Note that German and Austrian customers can use cross-border payment method via Amazon.
  • On your Amazon device launch the DAZN app and select to sign up.
  • Create an account with DAZN and confirm your email marketing preferences. Please note that your DAZN account is different from your Amazon account, regardless of the email address used and you can use the DAZN account to watch DAZN on any supported device.
  • Amazon’s standard in-app subscription popup will be displayed, sumarising information about your plan.
  • Confirm your subscription to complete sign-up.
  • Amazon’s standard confirmation popup will be displayed.
  • Click ‘Done’ and start watching DAZN.
  • Please note that you can access DAZN on any device using your DAZN credentials created.

Sign up using your Smart TV, or Gaming console (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN account using your Smart TV, or Gaming console:
  • On your device please navigate to the DAZN app and start it.
  • Once your app is loaded click on the "Sign up" button.
  • You get on the first page of the sign up, please fill in the requested details.
  • In the last step you need to choose your preferred payment method and enter your payment details. With a click on "Start Subscription" you will be successfully signed up for DAZN.
What to do if you run into problems during sign up?(back to top)
  • If you run into problems during your sign up please contact our customer service team. We will be happy to help you complete your sign up.

Title: How fast does my Internet need to be to watch DAZN in HD?
Content:
DAZN provides high-quality video streaming. It automatically selects the best video quality available for your device and internet connection speed. 

All DAZN programmes and live streams are available in 1080p Full High Definition, which means that as long as you have an internet speed of around 16mbps, you should experience the highest quality of definition.
However, to watch DAZN on your TV and laptop in HD (High Definition), we recommend an internet download speed of 9mbps and to watch in SD (Standard Definition), we recommend an internet download speed of 3mbps.



How to find out your internet download speed

To check your internet speed, go to Misurainternet .

Important considerations when watching sport streamed over the internet: Please also visit our troubleshoot your network connection help article which offers you some quick fixes for the most common problems and a quick and easy guide on how to test your internet connection speed.”
  1. Sometimes your device cannot use 100% of the available internet download speed. When this is the case you'll need up to 100% ore bandwidth to achieve the best quality possible.
  2. When someone else on your network uses the internet, it will reduce the available bandwidth for you to watch sport on DAZN.
  3. We do not support VPNs (Virtual Private Networks) or Proxys. Please remove these before attempting to watch DAZN.

Title: My email address is already in use?
Content:
If you get the error message that your email address is already in use, please go through the following steps:
 
  • Go to our sign in page and try to login with your email address and your password (You might have previously used that email address to register a DAZN account).
  • If this did not work, please request a new password using the password reset feature. You should receive an email with a link you can use to create a new password.
  • Once you have created a new password you should be able to sign in with your new password. If your account was cancelled in the past you need to enter your bank details to reactivate your subscription.
  • If you did not receive the link to create yourself a new password, or you are still unable to sign in with your account please contact customer support for further help.

Title: How can I show DAZN channels in my Pub?
Content:
Where do I sign up to show DAZN in my pub?
As of July 2021 DAZN will offer DAZN For Business, a dedicated product for the entertainment industry. Visit DAZN For Business to order your DAZN For Business subscription or to find out more.

Can I use DAZN without DAZN For Business in my pub?
No, this is not an option. DAZN For Business is the only legal way to show DAZN content in a public space.

Title: How do I change my personal details?
Content:
You can change your personal details anytime in My Account.

Once you are signed in you have the following options:
  • Change your name, e-mail, or password
  • Change your payment method, or cancel your subscription
  • Get an overview of your signed-in devices
  • Select your language preferences
  • Sign up and opt out of our newsletter

If you change your name, payment details or your password, we will send you a confirmation email.

Contact customer support

Title: How can I control how much data DAZN uses?
Content:
You can control how much data DAZN uses when streaming on mobile networks and WiFi on your iOS or Android mobile devices.

What is Data Capping for mobile?
The Data Capping feature allows you to reduce the amount of data that the DAZN app consumes when streaming content. There are two options:
  • Save data on 3G/4G/LTE
  • Save data on WiFi

When either are enabled, it will decrease the quality of a stream to reduce the amount of data that is used (approximately 400mb worth of data consumed per hour).

How do I set my data to be capped so that I can save data when streaming on DAZN?
To set a data cap to either your mobile network data or WiFi, please follow these steps
  1. When in the DAZN app, select the "Menu" button (On Android it is the  button, on iOS it is the "Menu" button in the bottom navigation bar) 
  2. Select "Data Saver"
  3. Select your preferred setting

Data setting changes you make from your mobile device apply to that device only while streaming over mobile networks or WiFi. While connected to Wi-Fi, we will attempt to stream in the highest quality possible for your connection speed and the content you´re watching.

Title: How to pause and rewind live streams to not miss any of the action?
Content:
You can simply press pause on your DAZN stream if you have somewhere to go. When you return, press play and the video continues from where you left off. You can then go back to the real-time version of the stream by clicking on the Go Live button to fast forward to the live action.

In the app you can pause, rewind, and fast forward both live and catch up videos. If you want to watch an incredible moment one more time simply skip back 30 seconds to relive the action. On your PC, phone or tablet, you can control playback by using the on-screen buttons and timeline, whilst for TVs and games consoles you can control playback via your remote control.

Title: EU Portability
Content:
What is EU portability? 

EU portability means you can watch DAZN from your home country even when you’re abroad in other EEA  countries. For example, if you live in Italy and don’t want to miss your favourite sporting event, but you’re travelling in Austria where Italian sport isn’t available on DAZN, EU portability means you can still watch it.      

If you’re using DAZN in other countries with EU portability, you’ll see what you’d usually see at home. If you’re travelling outside the EU or don’t have EU portability, you’ll see live and on-demand sports that’s usually available in the country you’re in. This applies to Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Liechtenstein the USA, Canada and Japan. 
      
Check if your subscription includes EU portability in My Account.  You can access My Account from anywhere. Just go to www.dazn.com. 
 
Countries with EU portability
If you’ve got EU  portability included in your subscription,    you can watch DAZN in any of the following countries. You’ll be able to watch the sports you’d see in your own country.   

•    Austria
•    Belgium
•    Bulgaria
•    Croatia
•    Republic of Cyprus
•    Czech Republic
•    Denmark
•    Estonia
•    Finland
•    France
•    Germany
•    Greece
•    Hungary
•    Iceland
•    Ireland
•    Italy
•    Latvia
•    Liechtenstein
•    Lithuania
•    Luxembourg
•    Malta
•    Netherlands
•    Norway
•    Poland
•    Portugal
•    Romania
•    Slovakia
•    Slovenia
•    Spain
•    Sweden. (-)
 


Troubleshooting EU portability

If you’re experiencing any issues with EU portability, some of these common troubleshooting tips might help.    
 
What to do if you've been denied EU portability
EU portability is controlled by specific regulations. When you sign up, your account will be subject to automatic checks. If you don’t have a valid, recurring payment method linked to your account, such as if you signed up with a code or gift card and didn’t add a payment method, you might be denied EU portability. 
We can’t manually adjust this after you’ve registered with us. To try and avoid this, make sure to add a valid payment method to your account when you sign up. 
How to access DAZN while you’re in another country
You can use DAZN as normal in other countries. If you’re already signed in, just open the app and start watching. If you’re not signed in, sign in through your browser or app and you can continue as normal.
Signing up to DAZN from other EU countries with EU portability
You’ll need to sign up to DAZN from the country where you live permanently. EU portability is currently available for EEA countries. 
DAZN account creation from other countries for customers that have DAZN included in their provider´s price
You will have to create a DAZN account in the country where you have signed up to DAZN through your provider
Where to download the DAZN app from
If you’re a Google Play Store user, you can download the DAZN app while on any network in a country where DAZN is available.
If you’re an App Store user, you can download the DAZN app if you’re logged into an Apple    account for any country where DAZN is live. 
We’d recommend installing the DAZN app before you travel. Or you can watch DAZN through your web browser in any EU country.
Resubscribing after a break with DAZN
If you’ve paused your subscription or are resubscribing after a cancellation, you won’t need to be verified when you reactivate your account. 
EU portability verification happens automatically when you resubscribe, so you won’t need to do anything.

Title: PayPal
Content:
Click the topic to get to the section:
  • How do I sign up using PayPal?
  • Do I have to have a PayPal account to sign-up to DAZN using PayPal?
  • What happens if my PayPal payment method expires, or I have insufficient funds in my linked account?
  • What happens if one of my monthly or annual payments through PayPal declined?
  • I had an error when signing up for DAZN via PayPal. What now?
  • I selected to pay for DAZN via PayPal, but now that I am on the PayPal screen, I’d like to use a different payment method instead.  How do I do this?
  • Will my PayPal account automatically be charged every month?
  • Can I delay my payment (a new option in PayPal - ‘pay after delivery’)?
  • How do I change my payment method to PayPal?
  • I pay via a third party (such as Apple, Amazon) how do I change my payment method to or from PayPal?
  • Where can I see a summary of the payments that DAZN has taken via PayPal?
  • How do I cancel my subscription?
  • Can I sign-up with/change payment method to PayPal on any device?
  • Can I sign-up to DAZN using a Gift Code and pay via PayPal?
  • I have a PayPal payment method that is based in a country that is different from the country I am signing up to DAZN from.  Can I still sign up using PayPal?
  • Can I pause my subscription using Paypal?
  • Will I see my PayPal ID within My Account in DAZN?
  • I have PayPal as a payment method, can I change my payment method to a different PayPal account?
How do I sign up using Paypal? (back to top)
You can only use PayPal to sign up to DAZN via web.  Simply create a DAZN account at www.dazn.com, providing your name, email and setting a password. Then, on the payment page select the ‘Continue to PayPal’ link. 

You will arrive on the standard PayPal checkout page within the same tab.  Once you are signed into your PayPal account, you can review and confirm your payment. 

On completion of the payment, the page will refresh to take you back to DAZN.  At this point, your subscription will be started and you can start watching sports immediately.

You will also receive two emails:
  • Welcome email from DAZN - You will receive an email confirming the start of your subscription. It will tell you the date and the price of your first payment.
  • Confirmation email from PayPal - On your first payment date you will receive a payment receipt stating the amount paid. Then each time you are charged using PayPal, you will receive the same email from PayPal.  You will not receive further emails from DAZN with each subsequent payment.

Do I have to have a PayPal account to sign-up to DAZN using PayPal? (back to top)
Yes. If you do not have a PayPal account but want to pay with PayPal, you will be given the option to create a PayPal account after selecting PayPal as your payment method. You will need to provide your credit card or bank details to create a PayPal account.

What happens if my PayPal payment method expires, or I have insufficient funds in my linked account? (back to top)
If your payment details have expired, or you do not have sufficient funds in your selected account, then PayPal will prompt you to update these when you attempt to sign up for DAZN.

What happens if one of my monthly or annual payments through PayPal declined? (back to top)
DAZN will send you an email to notify you of this as soon as your payment is declined.  This email will inform you that your payment could not be taken, and will contain a link to My Account where you can fix up your payment details. You will have 2 days to fix up your payment details with PayPal or select a different payment method before you lose access to DAZN.
You will receive two emails to confirm any issues with your payment:
  • Payment declined from DAZN - This email will confirm that your payment has been declined
  • Successful Payment from DAZN - This email will confirm a successful payment was taken within the 2 day mentioned above

I had an error when signing up for DAZN via PayPal. What now? (back to top)
If your PayPal payment fails for any reason during DAZN sign-up, you will be notified of this via a banner and redirected back to the DAZN payment page that you came from. At this point you can try again or choose a different payment method.

If you experience any errors within the PayPal payment pages themselves, such as an error when logging into your PayPal account, then you will see the standard PayPal errors.

I selected to pay for DAZN via PayPal, but now that I am on the PayPal screen, I’d like to use a different payment method instead.  How do I do this? (back to top)
Simply select to ‘Cancel’ on any PayPal page.  You will be automatically redirected to the DAZN payment page that you came from.  Here, you can select another payment method or try again with PayPal. 

Will my PayPal account automatically be charged every month? (back to top)
Yes, your PayPal account will be debited monthly.  

Can I delay my payment (a new option in PayPal - ‘pay after delivery’)? (back to top)
No. Since you can use DAZN immediately upon sign-up, you cannot select this option. 

How do I change my payment method to PayPal? (back to top)
Simply sign into My Account (www.dazn.com/myaccount).  When logged in, go to My Account and under the Payment section, select ‘Change payment method’. This will take effect from your next payment date. 

You will receive two emails to confirm this:
  • Confirmation of changes from DAZN - This email will confirm that you have changed your payment method.
  • Confirmation of changes from PayPal - On your next payment date you will receive a payment receipt stating the amount paid. Then each time you are charged using PayPal, you will receive the same email from PayPal.

I pay via a third party (such as Apple, Amazon) how do I change my payment method to or from PayPal? (back to top)
Customers who pay via a third party such as Apple or Amazon cannot change their payment method to PayPal via My Account.  If you currently pay for DAZN via a third party and wish to switch to PayPal, then you can cancel your DAZN account and resubscribe via PayPal.

Where can I see a summary of the payments that DAZN has taken via PayPal? (back to top)
You can go to My Account (www.dazn.com/myaccount) and select Payment History.  A new page will open where you can see each DAZN payment and the method that you used for that payment.  

You can also visit your PayPal account where you can see all of your PayPal transactions. DAZN will be listed as ‘DAZN’.

How do I cancel my subscription? (back to top)
Simply go to My Account and select to ‘Cancel Subscription’, the same as you would using any other payment method. 

When you successfully cancel your subscription, you will receive one email:
  • Confirmation of changes from DAZN - Confirmation from DAZN that you have cancelled your subscription. You will continue to have access to DAZN till the end of your paid for month - we will tell you when this is.

You will not receive an email from PayPal if you cancel your subscription from My Account in DAZN. You will only receive an email from PayPal if you cancel your payment to DAZN from within PayPal itself.  

Can I sign-up with/change payment method to PayPal on any device? (back to top)
You can only sign-up with/change your DAZN payment method to PayPal through the website or on mobile, tablet and desktop. However, you can manage your Paypal account on all devices supported by Paypal.

Can I sign-up to DAZN using a Gift Code and pay via PayPal? (back to top)
Yes, you can use a Gift Code and use PayPal as payment.

I have a PayPal payment method that is based in a country that is different from the country I am signing up to DAZN from.  Can I still sign up using PayPal? (back to top)
Yes, if you live in either Germany, Austria or Switzerland, and your billing address is also either Germany, Austria or Switzerland then your payment method will be approved. If you live outside of these countries and in a DAZN supported region, your billing address must be within the same country that you are signing up from.

Can I pause my subscription using Paypal? (back to top)
Yes, you can use the pause function within your account.

Will I see my PayPal ID within My Account in DAZN? (back to top)
Yes, this will be presented in My Account within your payment history section. The PayPal ID will be displayed but masked, meaning only the last 4 digits are visible. 

I have PayPal as a payment method, can I change my payment method to a different PayPal account? (back to top)
Yes, simply select ‘Change payment method’ within My Account.

Title: Subscription Changes
Content:
How do I change my plan down a subscription level?  

If you pay for DAZN directly you can change to a lower plan by logging into ‘My Account’. Under the ‘Manage Subscription’ section, select ‘Change Plan’ to speak to one of our experts who can find the right plan for you.  

However, if you pay for your DAZN subscription via a third party, such as Google or Apple, to change subscription plan you will have to access the subscription section in your relevant app store.  

 

Can I change my plan down at any time?  

If you are on a monthly (30 day) subscription, you can request to change your plan to a lower subscription at any time by speaking to one of our experts.  If you have an annual plan either by paying upfront or in monthly instalments, you can do this within the last 90 days of your current subscription period.  

You can change your plan via the Manage Subscription section of My Account, selecting ‘Change Plan’ to speak to one of our experts.  

 

Will my plan change take effect immediately?  

Any plan change to a lower plan will come into effect at the next renewal date of your current subscription. If you pay monthly, this will be on the next monthly billing date. For annual subscriptions, paying upfront or in monthly instalments, any plan change will come into effect at the end of the annual contract.  

Your plan will remain unchanged until your renewal date. You can continue to access your current plan details, payment & billing information, and other subscription details within the subscription tab in My Account. Your new plan details will be reflected only at your next subscription renewal date.  

 

What if I change my mind?  

You can cancel your plan change via ‘My Account’ at any time up until the day before your subscription renewal date. Simply select one of the ‘Cancel Plan Change’ options in the subscription tab of ‘My Account.’  If you cancel the change, you will stay on the same plan you are currently on. It can take a few minutes for your account to show this change.  

 

Are there other ways I can change my plan down?  

From time to time, we may inform you of the offers on our products and services that may result in your plan moving to a lower subscription level. Any change in plan down will be reflected at your subscription renewal date.  

 

Can I still make changes to my subscription whilst my change down is in progress?  

Whilst your plan is in the process of being changed, we will limit some capability in My Account such as Change Plan upgrade and changing how you pay for your subscription.  

To get access to these features you would first need to cancel your change plan down via My Account before you can make further changes to your subscription.

Title: Which content access technology is used on iOS devices?
Content: This product contains technology subject to certain intellectual property rights of Microsoft. Use or distribution of this technology outside of this product is prohibited without the appropriate license(s) from Microsoft. Content owners use Microsoft PlayReadyTM content access technology to protect their intellectual property, including copyrighted content. This device uses PlayReady technology to access PlayReady- protected content and/or WMDRM-protected content. If the device fails to properly enforce restrictions on content usage, content owners may require Microsoft to revoke the device’s ability to consume PlayReady-protected content. Revocation should not affect unprotected content or content protected by other content access technologies. Content owners may require you to upgrade PlayReady to access their content. If you decline an upgrade, you will not be able to access content that requires the upgrade.

Title: Get Season Pro free for 7 days
Content:
As a new customer, or an existing DAZN subscriber you can now get a free 7-day trial of our complete NFL Game Pass product – including all the matches, extended highlights, Game in 40, and the All-22 series.

How do I sign up? 
You can sign up and start watching right now – if you’re already a DAZN subscriber just click here to sign up for your NFL free trial.  

If you’re new to DAZN you can sign up for the free trial here - you won’t be charged until the trial period is over. 

Can I pay in installments after the free trial? 
The Season Pro package will be charged on day 8, for the full amount. If you want to pay in 4 installments, you can do so by cancelling your free trial on day 7 and then signing up for NFL Game Pass to be paid in installments here.

How can I stop the free trial? 
You can cancel the free trial at any point in the 7 days and payment won’t be taken for the Season Pro pass. To do so, please visit ‘My Account’ and go to the subscription section. After you’ve cancelled, you’ll still be able to continue watching for the rest of the day.

Title: NFL Game Pass - Game In 40 on iOS and Android Devices
Content:
To be able to watch Game in 40 you need to have the most up-to-date version of the DAZN app. 

You can make sure you are using the most recent version of the app by following the simple steps below: 

iOS App 

  1. Go to the App Store on your device 
  2. Search for DAZN 
  3. Where you see DAZN listed in the search results you can see a blue 'Update' button on the right hand side or 
  4. Select the DAZN app and at the top of the page click on the blue 'Update' button 

Android App 

  1. Go to Google Play on your device 
  2. Search for DAZN 
  3. Where you see DAZN listed in the search results you can see a blue 'Update' button on the right hand side or 
  4. Select the DAZN app and at the top of the page click on the blue 'Update' button 

If you need any more assistance then please contact us by using the 'need help' button in the bottom right corner of your screen and asking to speak to a human.

Title: NFL Game Pass - How many devices can I connect?
Content:
You can watch games, shows and more with NFL Game Pass on 5 different devices at the same time using the same internet network. 
 

If you’re having issues watching on two or three devices, make sure they are all coming from the same internet connection – for example, if you are watching NFL content on your TV that is connected to your home Wi-Fi and you want to watch on your mobile phone as well, your phone needs to be connected to your Wi-Fi, not your mobile data network.
 

 You can register up to 5 devices to watch on. To register your device, you just need to start watching, or manage your devices in "My Account".

Title: First steps to resolve streaming problems
Content:
Summary:
This article will help you perform basic troubleshooting if you run into any problems with watching DAZN.

Please select the device you want to troubleshoot:
  • Web browser
  • PlayStation
  • Xbox
  • iPhone and iPad
  • Android Phone and Tablet
  • Samsung Smart TV
  • LG Smart TV
  • Sony Smart TV
  • Panasonic Smart TV
  • Android TV
  • Amazon Fire TV and Fire TV stick
  • Amazon Fire Tablet

Basic troubleshooting on your Web browser (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your PC/MAC has a working internet connection check if you can access www.dazn.com. If you can see the page and did not receive an error message you know that the internet connection on your PC/MAC is working.
  • Check your internet connection speed at www.fast.com
    On your web browser please navigate to www.fast.com to check your internet connection speed. As this page is optimized for streaming services it will get you an adequate picture of the speed of your internet connection. To review how fast your internet should be to watch DAZN please click here.
  • Try another event and see if it works
    In your web browser check if you can load any other event which is currently running. Once it is working switch back to the original event you wanted to watch. If the other event is not working proceed to the next step.
  • Try a different web browser
    Simply try to watch DAZN in another web browser. For a list of available web browser please check http://outdatedbrowser.com . On this web page you can get the latest versions of available web browsers.
  • Delete cookies and cache
    Please navigate to our "How to delete your Cookies and Cache" article for more information in regards of the web browser you are using.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.

Basic troubleshooting on your PlayStation (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Try another event and see if it works
    In your DAZN app check if you can load any other event which is currently running. Once it is working switch back to the original event you wanted to watch. If the other event is not working proceed to the next step.
  • Restart the DAZN App
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your PlayStation controller click the "PS Home" button.
    • Go to the "TV & Video" section.
    • Navigate to the DAZN app and use the "Options" button on your controller.
    • Select "Close app".
    • Navigate to the DAZN app and start it again.
  • Try force closing the app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your PlayStation navigate to the DAZN app.
    • Use the option button on your PlayStation controller and select close from the dropdown menu to the right, which will close the DAZN app.
  • Restart your PlayStation
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Simply turn off your PlayStation.
    • Make sure to wait for 10 to 20 seconds
    • Start your PlayStation again.
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your PSN Store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    Please follow the steps below:
    • For detailed instructions on how to update your operating system on your PlayStation 4: click here.
  • Update DAZN app
    We would encourage you to enable automatic updates on your PlayStation to get your DAZN app automatically updated once an update is available.
    • For details instructions on how to enable automatic updates for PlayStation 4: click here
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.

Basic troubleshooting on your Xbox (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Try another event and see if it works
    In your DAZN app check if you can load any other event which is currently running. Once it is working switch back to the original event you wanted to watch. If the other event is not working proceed to the next step.
  • Restart your App
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your Xbox controller push the Xbox button to return to the home screen
    • Navigate to the DAZN app
    • Push the menu/option button on your controller
    • Select "Quit"
    • Wait for 5 to 10 seconds and start the DAZN again
  • Try force closing the app
    Please follow the guide on the Xbox Support page to force close the DAZN app.
  • Restart your Device
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Simply turn your Xbox off and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds before you plug it back in.
    • Afterwards turn the Xbox back on.
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don’t have any other streaming app please check if your Xbox store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    For detailed instructions on how to update your operating system on your Xbox: click here
  • Update DAZN app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your Xbox please navigate to the DAZN app (do not start it)
    • Use the options button on your Xbox controller
    • Select "Check for Updates"
    • If an update is available you will be able to install it now
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.

Basic troubleshooting on your iPhone and iPad (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Confirm device is supported
    • iPhone 5, or newer
    • iPod Touch (5th Generation), or newer
    • iPad 2, or newer
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your iPhone, or iPad
    To check if your iPhone, or iPad has a working internet connection check if you can access www.dazn.com on your Apple Safari browser. If you can see the page and did not receive an error message you know that the internet connection on your iPhone, or iPad is working.
  • Restart the DAZN app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Double-click the Home button to show your most recently used apps.
    • Swipe right or left to find the DAZN app that you want to close.
    • Swipe up on the app's preview to close the app.
    • Click on the DAZN app to reboot it.
  • Update your DAZN app
    Please go through the following steps:
    • On your device please navigate to the appstore
    • In the appstore click on the update button
    • Swipe your screen down to see if there are updates available for your apps
    • If there is an update for DAZN available you will see it in the list
    • Click on update to install the latest version of DAZN
  • Restart your Device
    Please check out the official Apple support page for detailed instruction on how to restart your device.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Lightly touch and hold the DAZN app until it jiggles
    • Tap "X" in the upper left corner of the app
    • Tap delete
    • Go to the app store
    • Enter "DAZN" into the search field
    • Click on the small cloud symbol next to the DAZN app

Basic troubleshooting on your Android Phone and Tablet (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Confirm device is supported
    Your Android Phone, or Tablet must be able to run operating systems 4.4 and above.
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your Android phone, or tablet
    To check if your Android phone, or tablet has a working internet connection check if you can access www.dazn.com on your web browser. If you can see the page and did not receive an error message you know that the internet connection on your Android phone, or tablet is working.
  • Try force closing the app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your device tap the overview button (This button is usually located on the bottom of your screen and resembles often a simple square, or two rectangles overlapping each other)
    • Scroll through the apps until you find the DAZN app
    • Drag the app off the screen (This will close the app, but will not stop any background processes)
  • Check for new updates of the DAZN app
    Please go to the Google Playstore and check if for an update of the DAZN app. If an update is available make sure to download the latest version of your App.
  • Restart your Device
    Please go through the steps below on your Android device:
    • In order to reboot your Android smartphone or tablet press down on the suspend button and hold it down for several seconds. You will find the suspend button is usually on the right side of the device just above the volume buttons.
    • After a few second you will see a menu. Select "Restart" from the menu if available, otherwise select "Power Off"
    • If your device doesn't restart automatically push and hold down on the suspend again until it restarts
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Open your device's Settings app
    • Tap "Apps & notifications"
    • Tap on the DAZN app (If you don't see it, first tap See all apps or App info)
    • Tap uninstall
    • Sign in to the Google Play Store (Ensure your device is connected to the internet)
    • Use the search function and enter "DAZN", or look in the sport section of the Google Play Store.
      You can also follow this link to the DAZN page on the Google Play Store.
    • Follow the instructions on your TV to install the DAZN app

Basic troubleshooting on your Samsung Smart TV (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Try another event and see if it works
    In your DAZN app check if you can load any other event which is currently running. Once it is working switch back to the original event you wanted to watch. If the other event is not working proceed to the next step.
  • Restart your App
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On the DAZN homescreen, navigate upwards until you see the menu bar
    • Select "Exit App" on the right side of the menu bar
    • Once you are back on your home screen please navigate the DAZN app and start it
  • Try force closing the app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your remote please hold the back button for a few seconds. This should bring up the option to Exit the app.
    • If that did not work, please power off your TV and unplug it for 10 to 20 seconds. Afterwards plug your TV back in and restart it.
  • Restart your Device
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Turn off your Samsung Smart TV and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds
    • Afterwards turn your Samsung Smart TV back on and restart it
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your app store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    For information on how to update your Samsung Smart TV please visit the official Samsung support page.
  • Reinstall the DAZN app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your device navigate to the tile of the DAZN app (do not start the app)
    • Using your remote control navigate and down and select delete
    • Navigate to the app store
    • Search for DAZN and install the latest version of the app
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.

Basic troubleshooting on your LG Smart TV (back to top)
Please go through the steps below:
  • Try another event and see if it works
    In your DAZN app check if you can load any other event which is currently running. Once it is working switch back to the original event you wanted to watch. If the other event is not working proceed to the next step.
  • Restart the DAZN App
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your LG Smart TV start any other app you have installed.
    • Click the "Smarthub" button on your remote control.
    • On the left side you will find your activity feed.
    • Go on your activity feed, navigate up until you see a small "X" and close the DAZN application.
    • Once you have closed the DAZN app you can start it again.
  • Try force closing the app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your remote control use the "Home" button and open another App
    • Go to "Recent" apps and go to the DAZN app
    • Click upwards twice and then click "OK" to close the DAZN app
    • Afterwards please restart the App and see if your problem was fixed
  • Restart your Device
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Turn off your LG Smart TV and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds
    • Afterwards turn your LG Smart TV back on and restart it
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your app store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    For information on how to update your LG Smart TV please visit the official LG support page.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your LG Smart TV please select the DAZN application and press the green colored button to display the options
    • Use the up and down arrows on your remote to select "Delete" and press "Enter" on your remote
    • Use the side arrows to select "Yes"; and confirm with "Enter"
    • Please go to the LG content store
    • Use the search function and enter "DAZN"
    • Select DAZN and follow on screen instructions to download DAZN again.
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don’t just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
Basic troubleshooting on your Sony Smart TV (back to top )
Please go through the steps below:
  • Try another event and see if it works
    • In your DAZN app check if you can load any other event which is currently running. Once it is working switch back to the original event you wanted to watch. If the other event is not working proceed to the next step.
  • Restart your App
    • Please follow the steps below:
    • On your device please navigate upwards until you see the menu bar
    • Select "Exit App" on the right side of the menu bar
    • Once you are back on your home screen please navigate the DAZN app and start it
  • Try force closing the app
    • Please follow the steps below:
    • Go into the settings menu
    • Select "Applications" and confirm with the enter button
    • Select "Manage applications" and confirm with the enter button
    • Select "Downloaded" and afterwards press the down arrow button to select the DAZN application pressing the enter button
    • Press the enter button again and select "Force stop"
    • Press the enter button again to select "OK"
  • Restart your Device
    • Please follow the steps below:
    • Turn off your Sony Smart TV and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds
    • Afterwards turn your Sony Smart TV back on and restart it
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    • On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your app store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    • Please follow the information on the Sony Support page for information on how to update your Smart/Android TV.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    • Please follow the steps below:
    • Please follow the steps on the Sony Support page to remove the DAZN application
    • Afterwards go to the Google play store
    • Use the search function and search for "DAZN"
    • Click on the app and follow instructions to install
  • Restart your Router
    • Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don’t just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.

Title: How to watch DAZN on iPhone & iPad
Content:
Click the topic to get to the section:
  • Watch DAZN on your iPhone & iPad
  • Download and install the DAZN app
  • Update your DAZN app
  • Sign up on your iPhone/iPad
  • Additional iPhone & iPad information
  • Supported models
  • Cancel your iTunes DAZN subscription
  • Connect my iOS device to my TV to stream DAZN
Watch DAZN on your iPhone & iPad (Back to top)
To get the best experience watching DAZN on your iPhone/iPad make sure to install the DAZN app. Make sure to use the app when watching DAZN and not the Safari, or any other browser.

Download and install the DAZN app (Back to top)
To download and install the DAZN app please go through the following steps on your device:
  • On your device please navigate to the Appstore  
  • Use the search option (1) and enter "DAZN" (2) in the search field. If you already have the DAZN app on your device it will give you the option to open the app. Otherwise you can download the app.
  • Now click on "Get" next to the DAZN symbol. In the final step you will need to click install on the pop-up

Update your DAZN app (Back to top)
To update your DAZN app please go through the following steps on your device:
  • On your device please navigate to the appstore
  • In the appstore click on the update button
  • Swipe your screen down to see if there are updates available for your apps
  • If there is an update for DAZN available you will see it in the list
  • Click on update to install the latest version of DAZN

Sign up on your IPhone/iPad (Back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN Account on your iPhone/iPad:
  • On your iPhone/iPad home screen start your DAZN app
  • Click on the Sign up button  
  • Fill out your personal information for your Account and click on "Start Watching"  
  • Confirm your payment via iTunes for your DAZN account
If you prefer to sign up with another payment method, simply go to www.dazn.com and follow the instructions to start your free month. Once you signed up, you can use the same credentials to sign in on your Apple TV.

Additional iPhone & iPad information (Back to top)
For the best DAZN experience make sure that your iOS is up to date. Please visit Apple Support for detailed information on how you can update your iOS.

Supported models (Back to top)
The DAZN app is available for iOS devices running iOS 11 including iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. More specific information can be found by following this link.

Cancel your iTunes DAZN subscription (Back to top)
You review and cancel your DAZN subscription within iTunes on a computer. Go to Account > View my Account and within the Subscriptions page, select Manage. Quick ways to access your account on your device:
  • iOS:
    • The easiest way to cancel your DAZN account is to access the My Account section within the menu in the DAZN app. You’ll then find a link to the iTunes Store where you can cancel at any time and your subscription will run to the end of your current payment period.
  • Apple TV:
    • On your Apple TV, you can also manage your subscription in Settings > Accounts > Subscriptions > Manage Subscriptions.
 
For more information about managing subscriptions with your iTunes Store account, visit the Apple support page.


Connect my iOS device to my TV to stream DAZN? (Back to top)
In the latest version of DAZN app, we have introduced the ability to connect your device to a TV via HDMI and mirror your iPad or iPhone 6 and above through AirPlay to watch DAZN on a larger screen. Here are a few ways you can connect to your TV:

Connect via HDMI
You can use a compatible HDMI connection kit to connect your device to your TV. Please use an official Apple product to ensure the highest quality of streaming. 

Connect via AirPlay Device Mirroring
You can now link your iOS device to an Apple TV, giving you the ability to mirror your display on it. You can then open the DAZN app, and start watching content. More information is available on Apple's support website. Please use an official Apple product to ensure the highest quality of streaming. 

(Please note that when connecting iPads through HDMI or AirPlay, it will be displayed in a cropped view on your TV, also referred to as letterboxed, as the iPad screens are not 16:9 in size which most TV’s are)

Title: Everything to help you out on your smart TV
Content:
Can I sign up to DAZN on my TV?
Yes, you can sign up on your TV. If you already have a DAZN account, you just need to sign in. Once you have set up DAZN through your TV, you are able to access the service across any of our supported devices. You may find it easier to sign up on the DAZN website, or using a full keyboard rather than the TV remote. 
 
How do I restart the DAZN app?
Like your TV device, an app needs to be reset every now and then. In order to do this, press up on the remote control until the Menu rail appears, select ‘Exit App’ at the end of your session. This will stop the video being streamed to your device. Allow 5 minutes before returning to the app.
 
What’s the difference between the ‘Sign Out’ and ‘Exit App’ options?
If you select the option to sign out from the app, you will need to sign in next time you launch the DAZN app - choose this option if you don’t want anyone else to use your account on your device, or to swap accounts. You’re allowed to sign in to up to 6 devices with one account at the same time. If you decide to select the option to exit the app then you will not be signed out. 
 
The picture quality doesn’t look very good.
We recommend if possible you use a wired connection to your modem, but you are still able to use the service with a Wi-Fi connection. The strength of your Wi-Fi connection and the overall bandwidth supplied by your ISP will determine what picture quality you can receive. Playback uses “adaptive bit rate” which will always start with highly compressed video optimised for low bandwidth users and then improve quality to match your connection. If you believe the quality of video is still poor after 2 minutes playback and you have sufficient bandwidth available, please contact Customer Support.
 
What happens if I have problems with playback?
First check your broadband connection in the device Settings. If you have problems we advise using a wired connection to your device. Or, a quick fix for a playback problem is to open a Sports or Category page and return to the event you intended to watch. This often resolves temporary issues. 
 
I’m seeing a buffering spinner all the time.
If we’re unable to stream video to your device (due to a number of reasons) you may see a buffering spinner. If you try other pieces of content and still see a buffering spinner for more than a minute, please contact Customer Support.
 
Why does the Menu keep disappearing?
To make it really easy for you to enjoy watching games in full screen, we automatically hide the app menu after fifteen seconds. On your remote control, press up/down or back, and the rails will return.
 
I’ve got to somewhere in the app and I don’t know how to get out
If you are unsure of what screen you are looking at and don’t know how to get back, press back. This will navigate you back through your journey. If you are still unsure, press Home on your remote and don’t return to the DAZN app after 5 minutes. When you return to DAZN, you’ll be taken to the home screen of the app and the sport will begin again.
 
How do I provide feedback for the DAZN app on my Smart TV?
We’re always looking for feedback from users like yourself. Let us know on social media or contact Customer Support on live chat.

Title: I cannot log in / sign in to DAZN
Content:
Please follow the steps below if you have problems accessing your account:
  • Accessing "My Account"
  • At the sign in make sure to verify your login details / Error code 50-49-401.
  • Reset your password.
  • Recover your email address
  • Restart your device.
  • Contact customer support.

Accessing "My Account" (back to top)
After your registration it may take up to 4 hours until you are able to access "My Account". Otherwise you should be able to access "My Account" at any time using this link.

At the sign in make sure to verify your login details (error code 50-49-401) (back to top)
When you try to sign in make sure to check your email address and password for typos and make sure to use the details you entered when registered. If you have entered your wrong login details you will receive a banner stating error code 50-49-401. If you have entered the wrong password for more than 10 times in a row, you receive error code 50-00-429 and our system will log you out for approximately 15 minutes before you can try again to login. This is to protect your account and prevent an unauthorized person to gain access.

Reset your Password (back to top)
Please follow the steps below to reset your password:
  • Please use our password recovery function by following this link.
  • On the following page please enter your Email Address and click on “Send”.
  • You will receive a notification that we have sent an email to the email address entered.
    Please check your inbox and spam folder of your email account for an email from “DAZN support” with the subject “Change your password”. Please take into consideration that it can take some time for the password reset email to arrive.
  • In your mail from DAZN you will find a “Reset Password” button. Please click this now.
  • You will be redirected to a new page where you can enter your new password. Make sure to follow the below criteria for your new password:
    • Contains at least one uppercase and lowercase letter.
    • No spaces in the password allowed.
    • Contains at least one letter and one number.
    • You will need to verify your password to make sure there is no typo in your password. Once you have selected and entered your new password please click on “Change Password”.
  • Once you have changed your password you can use your new password to sign in to DAZN.

Recover your email address (back to top)
Please take this link to recover your email address. In order to recover your email address you will need the following details:
  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Payment method
  • Last 4 digits of your payment method

Restart your device (back to top)
Depending on your device the steps might be different. As a general guideline you can close the app and power your device off, if it doesn’t have a restart option. Afterwards please wait 10 to 20 seconds before you start your device again.

Contact customer support (back to top)
If you are still not able to access your account, please contact customer service for further help. To verify your account please provide the following information when contacting customer service:
  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Email
  • Last 4 digits of your credit card and expiry date
  • Voucher Code number (if you have one)
  • Sign up date

Title: What can I do if my DAZN app doesn't start?
Content:
Summary:
In this article you will find troubleshooting steps if your DAZN app doesn't start.

From the list below please select the device you want to troubleshoot:
  • Web browser
  • PlayStation
  • Xbox
  • iPhone and iPad
  • Android Phone and Tablet
  • Samsung Smart TV
  • LG Smart TV
  • Sony Smart TV
  • Panasonic Smart TV
  • Android TV
  • Amazon Fire TV and Fire TV stick
  • Amazon Fire Tablet

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Web browser (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Web browser:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your PC/MAC has a working internet connection check if you can access www.dazn.com . If you can see the page and did not receive an error message you know that the internet connection on your PC/MAC is working.
  • Check your internet connection speed at www.fast.com
    On your web browser please navigate to www.fast.com to check your internet connection speed. As this page is optimized for streaming services it will get you an adequate picture of the speed of your internet connection. To review how fast your internet should be to watch DAZN please click here.
  • Try a different web browser
    Simply try to watch DAZN in another web browser. For a list of available web browser please check http://outdatedbrowser.com/. On this web page you can get the latest versions of available web browsers.
  • Delete cookies and cache
    Please navigate to our "How to delete your Cookies and Cache" article for more information in regards of the web browser you are using.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your PlayStation (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your PlayStation:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your device has a working internet connection open your web browser on your device and visit www.dazn.com . If the page loads you know that your internet connection is working. Alternatively, you can visit the app store on your device to see if your device has a working internet connection. Alternatively you can open your app store to see if you can browse through it.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    Please follow the steps below:
    • For detailed instructions on how to update your operating system on your PlayStation 4: click here.
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your PSN Store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Restart your PlayStation
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Simply turn off your PlayStation.
    • Make sure to wait for 10 to 20 seconds
    • Start your PlayStation again.
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your PlayStation navigate to the DAZN app. On the DAZN app use the option button and select delete from the dropdown menu.
    • Go to the PSN store, search for DAZN and download the app again.
  • Connect Device with via cable
    Simply connect your device using an ethernet cable to your router. In this way you will eliminate any streaming issues due to poor Wi-Fi connection.

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Xbox (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Xbox:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your device has a working internet connection open your web browser on your device and visit www.dazn.com . If the page loads you know that your internet connection is working. Alternatively, you can visit the app store on your device to see if your device has a working internet connection. Alternatively you can open your app store to see if you can browse through it.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    For detailed instructions on how to update your operating system on your Xbox: click here
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don’t have any other streaming app please check if your Xbox store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Restart your Device
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Simply turn your Xbox off and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds before you plug it back in.
    • Afterwards turn the Xbox back on.
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    PLease follow the steps below:
    • On your Xbox navigate to the DAZN app.
    • On the DAZN app use the menu button and select delete from the dropdown menu.
    • Once the app is deleted go to your Xbox store
    • Enter "DAZN" into the search function, open the app and install it again
  • Connect Device with via cable
    Simply connect your device using an ethernet cable to your router. In this way you will eliminate any streaming issues due to poor Wi-Fi connection.

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your iPhone, or iPad (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your iPhone, or iPad:
  • Try forceclosing the app
    Please go through the following steps:
    • On your home screen double tap the Home button
    • Swipe left and right until you find the DAZN app
    • Drag the DAZN app upwards from your home screen
    • Tap the Home button again
    • Navigate to the DAZN app and start it
  • Update your DAZN app
    Please go through the following steps:
    • On your device please navigate to the appstore
    • In the appstore click on the update button
    • Swipe your screen down to see if there are updates available for your apps
    • If there is an update for DAZN available you will see it in the list
    • Click on update to install the latest version of DAZN
  • Restart your Device
    Please check out the official Apple support page for detailed instruction on how to restart your device.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Lightly touch and hold the DAZN app until it jiggles
    • Tap "X" in the upper left corner of the app
    • Tap delete
    • Go to the app store
    • Enter "DAZN" into the search field
    • Click on the small cloud symbol next to the DAZN app
  • Confirm device is supported
    • iPhone 5, or newer
    • iPod Touch (5th Generation), or newer
    • iPad 2, or newer

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Android Phone, or Tablet (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Android Phone, or Tablet:
  • Try forceclosing the app
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Tap on the overview button (square button on the bottom of your screen)
    • Scroll through the apps until you find the DAZN app
    • Drag the app off the screen
    • Go to the home screen and restart on the DAZN app
  • Check for new updates of the DAZN app
    Please go to the Google Playstore and check if for an update of the DAZN app. If an update is available make sure to download the latest version of your App.
  • Restart your Device
    Please go through the steps below on your Android device:
    • In order to reboot your Android smartphone or tablet press down on the suspend button and hold it down for several seconds. You will find the suspend button is usually on the right side of the device just above the volume buttons.
    • After a few second you will see a menu. Select "Restart" from the menu if available, otherwise select "Power Off"
    • If your device doesn't restart automatically push and hold down on the suspend again until it restarts
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Open your device's Settings app
    • Tap "Apps & notifications"
    • Tap on the DAZN app (If you don't see it, first tap See all apps or App info)
    • Tap uninstall
    • Sign in to the Google Play Store (Ensure your device is connected to the internet)
    • Use the search function and enter "DAZN", or look in the sport section of the Google Play Store.
      You can also follow this link to the DAZN page on the Google Play Store.
    • Follow the instructions on your TV to install the DAZN app
  • Confirm device is supported
    Your Android Phone, or Tablet must be able to run operating systems 4.4 and above.

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Samsung Smart TV (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Samsung Smart TV:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your device has a working internet connection open your web browser on your device and visit www.dazn.com . If the page loads you know that your internet connection is working. Alternatively, you can visit the app store on your device to see if your device has a working internet connection. Alternatively you can open your app store to see if you can browse through it.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    For information on how to update your Samsung Smart TV please visit the official Samsung support page.
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your app store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Restart your Device
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Turn off your Samsung Smart TV and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds
    • Afterwards turn your Samsung Smart TV back on and restart it
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
  • Reinstall the DAZN app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your device navigate to the tile of the DAZN app (do not start the app)
    • Using your remote control navigate and down and select delete
    • Navigate to the app store
    • Search for DAZN and install the latest version of the app
  • Connect Device with via cable
    Simply connect your device using an ethernet cable to your router. In this way you will eliminate any streaming issues due to poor Wi-Fi connection.
