Title: Apple subscription access
Content:
If you subscribed to DAZN via Apple iOS device or iTunes and you are having trouble logging in, please follow these restore purchase steps to gain access: 

Restore subscription on "Sign in" page
  1. On a mobile iOS device make sure you are signed into your iTunes account which was used for DAZN subscription payment
  2. Open DAZN App and use "Sign in" button
  3. On "Sign in" page tap on "Restore purchase" button
  4. You will now be signed in and redirected to "Home" page

Restore subscription on "Sign up" page
  1. On a mobile iOS device make sure you are signed into your iTunes account which was used for DAZN subscription payment
  2. Open DAZN App and use "Sign up" button
  3. On "Sign up" page tap on "Restore purchase" button
  4. You will now be signed in and redirected to "Home" page

Please note: Active DAZN subscriptions will not receive a separate charge as a result of restoring purchase and your current billing date will remain the same.
If you still are having trouble with your account, please reach out to customer service.

Title: How to reinstall the DAZN app
Content:
From the list below please select the device where you want to reinstall the DAZN app:
  • PlayStation
  • Xbox
  • iPhone and iPad
  • Android Phone and Tablet
  • Samsung Smart TV
  • LG Smart TV
  • Sony Smart TV
  • Android TV
  • Amazon Fire TV and Fire TV stick
  • Amazon Fire Tablet

Reinstall the DAZN app on your PlayStation (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your PlayStation:
  • On your PlayStation navigate to the DAZN app. On the DAZN app use the option button and select delete from the dropdown menu.
  • Go to the PSN store, search for DAZN and download the app again.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Xbox (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Xbox:
  • On your Xbox navigate to the DAZN app.
  • On the DAZN app use the menu button and select delete from the dropdown menu.
  • Once the app is deleted go to your Xbox store.
  • Enter "DAZN" into the search function, open the app and install it again.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your iPhone and iPad (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your iPhone, or iPad:
  • Tap on the DAZN app until it starts to wiggle.
  • Push on the "X" in the upper left corner.
  • When prompted, confirm with delete.
  • Go to the Apple app store.
  • Search for "DAZN" and open the DAZN page on the app store.
  • Click on the little cloud icon, or install to reinstall the app.
  • If prompted confirm the installation.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Android Phone and Tablet (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Android Phone, or Tablet:
  • Open your devices "Settings" app.
  • Tap "Apps & notifications".
  • Tap the app you want to uninstall (If you don't see it, first tap See all apps or App info).
  • Tap uninstall.
  • Open the Google Play Store app.
  • Tap Menu > My apps & games > Library.
  • Tap the app you want to install or turn on.
  • Tap Install or Enable.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Samsung Smart TV (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Samsung Smart TV:
  • On your device navigate to the tile of the DAZN app (do not start the app).
  • Using your remote control navigate and down and select delete.
  • Navigate to the app store.
  • Search for DAZN and install the latest version of the app.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your LG Smart TV (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your LG Smart TV:
  • On your LG Smart TV please select the DAZN application and press the green colored button to display the options.
  • Use the up and down arrows on your remote to select "Delete" and press "Enter" on your remote.
  • Use the side arrows to select "Yes"; and confirm with "Enter".
  • Please go to the LG content store.
  • Use the search function and enter "DAZN".
  • Select DAZN and follow on screen instructions to download DAZN again.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Sony Smart TV (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Sony Smart TV:
  • Please follow the steps on the Sony Support page to remove the DAZN application.
  • Afterwards go to the Google play store.
  • Use the search function and search for "DAZN".
  • Click on the app and follow instructions to install.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Android TV (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Android TV:
  • From the Android TV Home screen, scroll down and select Settings.
  • Go to "Device" and select "Apps".
  • Under "Downloaded apps" choose the DAZN app.
  • Select Uninstall and confirm with "OK".
  • Afterwards go to the Google play store.
  • Use the search function and search for "DAZN".
  • Click on the app and follow instructions to install.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Fire TV and Fire TV stick (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Fire TV and Fire TV stick:
  • On your Amazon Fire TV please navigate to the "Your apps and games" section.
  • Make sure to scroll completely to the right and select "See all".
  • Once your app overview loads navigate to the DAZN app and click on the options button on your remote.
  • Select "Uninstall" from the menu on the right side.
  • Afterwards use the search function on the "Home" section and search for DAZN.
  • Click on the DAZN app and follow the instructions to install the app.
Reinstall the DAZN app on your Amazon Fire Tablet (back to top)
Please go through the following steps to reinstall the DAZN app on your Fire TV and Amazon Fire Tablet:
  • On your Amazon Fire Tablet home screen, tap "Apps".
  • From the upper right corner of the screen, tap Device to show only apps that are downloaded to your device.
  • When you locate the app you want to remove, press and hold the app until a check mark appears. Tap Remove and then tap From Device.
  • Go back to the home screen and tap on "Store".
  • In the Search field, type DAZN, and then tap the magnifying glass.
  • Tap the button displaying free next to the DAZN app and follow the instructions to install the DAZN app.

Title: Google Chromecast support
Content:
Click the topic to get to the section:
  • Watch DAZN on your Google Chromecast
  • Set up your Google Chromecast
  • Sign up on your Chromecast
  • Devices compatible for Chromecast to view DAZN
  • Unsupported devices
  • What power supply does my Google Chromecast need to be able to run DAZN?
  • Additional information for your Chromecast
  • Troubleshoot your device

Watch DAZN on your Google Chromecast (Back to top)
Chromecast is a device that plugs into the HDMI port of your TV. It's a quick and easy way to convert your TV into a "Smart" TV. You send the video from the DAZN app on your smartphone to the TV using your home WiFi.

Chromecast ultra is capable of connecting via a LAN cable. Please ensure that you are using the same internet connection when you use Chromecast.

Set up your Google Chromecast (Back to top)
Set up your Chromecast by following the steps here and connect your smartphone or tablet:
  • Make sure you are using the same Wifi connection as your Chromecast
  • Make sure you are using the latest version of the DAZN app. If you're not sure, please visit the Apple app store for Apple devices or the Google Playstore for Android devices.
  • Open your DAZN app
  • Tap the Chromecast symbol, next to the search icon
  • Choose your Chromecast
  • The video you choose should now start playing on your TV or monitor. You can browse through different events while still watching your video.
  • Once you've setup your Chromecast correctly, the Chromecast icon will appear on the top right of the DAZN app. Tap the Chromecast icon and select your Chromecast's name. Select your video and it will start playing on your TV.
Sign up on your Chromecast (Back to top)
It is not possible to sign up with your Chromecast device. The easiest option to sign up for your DAZN membership is using a web browser on a PC. Click here for more information on how you can sign up for DAZN.

Devices compatible for Chromecast to view DAZN (Back to top)
  • Mobile phones and tablets - An iPhone or iPad running iOS9 or above, as well as Android phones and tablets running OS 4.4 or above
  • PC Browser- Google Chrome only
Unsupported devices (Back to top)
  • TV`s with built in Chromecast are currently not compatible with DAZN.
  • Due to technical limitations of older devices, from 11th March 2021, DAZN will no longer be available on Google Chromecast 1st Generation (Model number: H2G2-42).
What power supply does my Google Chromecast need to be able to run DAZN? (back to top)
We highly recommend to plug the device into the power supply on the wall using the supplied power cable. If you want to connect it to your Smart TV only please make sure that the USB power source specifically states 5V1a. If it doesn’t say 5V1a or says 5V 0.5a then DAZN will sadly not work correctly.

Additional information for your Chromecast (Back to top)
  • I've started playing video on my TV through the Chromecast. Can I do other things on my phone while the video is on the TV screen?
    • Yes! You can access other features on your phone while you play videos on Chromecast.
  • Can other people use my Chromecast?
    • Yes, as long as they're connected to the same WiFi network as your Chromecast. They will be able to see and connect to your Chromecast after tapping on the Chromecast icon and selecting its name.
Troubleshoot your device (Back to top)
  • I don't see the Chromecast icon on the top right of the DAZN app.
    • Please update to the latest version of the DAZN app
    • Please update Google Play Services to the latest version if you are using version 10.0 or below.
    • Is your Chromecast powered up, set up correctly, and plugged in to your TV?
    • Once you've setup your Chromecast correctly, the Chromecast icon will appear on the top right of the DAZN app. Tap the Chromecast icon and select your Chromecast's name. Select your video and it will start playing on your TV.
  • I don't know my Chromecast's name
    • The standard Chromecast background has your device's name in the bottom left. Your Chromecast will have a default name associated to it - something similar to Chromecast1234'. During the setup process you are asked to name it.
  • I can't find my answer on this page.
    • We recommend you visit the official Chromecast Help page for further assistance - https://support.google.com/chromecast/chromecast

Title: Setting up reminders for events on DAZN
Content:
How reminders work


If you set up a reminder for an event on DAZN, you’ll get a push notification on your smartphone or tablet 5 minutes before the event starts. You can tap the push notification to open the DAZN app and go straight to the event. You’ll get push notifications on any mobile device logged in to your account.
 

How to set up reminders 
 

You can set up reminders for any event on DAZN, up to two weeks before the event starts. To get reminders, you’ll need to enable push notifications on your device first. Here’s how:  
 

Setting up reminders on iOS (iPhone or iPad) devices 
 

  • Go to Settings  

  • Select Notifications 

  • Select the DAZN app 

  • Enable push notifications 
     

Setting up reminders on Android devices 
 

  • Go to Settings  

  • Select Notifications 

  • Select the DAZN app 

  • Enable push notifications 
     

You can disable push notifications at any time in the same way. You can also set Reminders from the schedule, sport, competition, league, or team page. You'll see the reminder icon right below the event image.  
 

 
 

How Reminders work with Following 
 

You’ll automatically get Reminders for any competition or team you follow. You can manage your preferences in Settings under Following.

Title: What can I do if my video is buffering or I see a spinning circle?
Content:
When troubleshooting streaming or rebuffering issues DAZN finds that it is often due to poor connectivity with your home network. Below are a few suggestions on how to improve your overall streaming experience.
  1. Try another event and see if it works
  2. Please go to http://www.fast.com and check that your internet connection speed meets our minimum requirements.
  3. If possible, connect your device with an ethernet cable to your router or modem
  4. Reduce the number of devices using your wi-fi network
  5. Restart your modem and/or router
  6. Confirm that other streaming apps are working
  7. Confirm the latest operating system is installed
  8. Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN app
  9. Restart your device
Additional steps for your web browser:
  1. Delete cookies and cache
  2. Try a different web browser
If you are still having problems, we suggest that you contact your internet service provider to discuss your home network connectivity to improve your streaming quality while watching DAZN

Title: VPN Blocking
Content:
What is a VPN?
VPN stands for Virtual Proxy Network. It’s a tool that assigns you a new IP address and allows you to “geo-spoof” your location in order to access internet-based services denied to you based on your geographical location. When your DAZN app loads, it checks your IP address and if you are in a supported country, we allow you to access the service. 
 
Why are you seeing an error mentioning using a VPN?
If our systems have detected that you are accessing DAZN using a VPN, you’ll be notified and restricted from accessing the service and watching content. In order to access DAZN you must not be using a VPN.
 
Why are we stopping you from using DAZN with a VPN?
DAZN is only available in a limited number of countries. The sports we show come with strict controls around the country they can be broadcast in. Therefore, we have to restrict access to users trying to view DAZN from outside these countries and as a result are blocking VPN users who are not authorised to view content due to the country they reside in. 
 
If I’m a German customer, can I access the Japanese version of DAZN using a VPN?
We only allow users to access the service without using a VPN, regardless if you’re from a supported country. 
 
DAZN is blocking me, but I’m convinced I’m not using a VPN
Public networks, such as hotels or hotspots, often use a VPN for their own protection. Therefore, make sure you are connected to a private network or use mobile data on your phone.

Some browser extensions, as well as activation programs, also use built-in VPNs, which may be responsible for this error message. Try deactivating these programs and then try again.

If these steps do not help, contact your internet service provider for assistance.

 
I can’t use DAZN anymore and want to cancel my account 
You can manage your account by accessing www.dazn.com

What exactly will happen when you end DAZN support on LG Netcast TV?
You will be unable to use the DAZN app on the LG Netcast TV to browse DAZN’s catalogue or watch sport. If you are a new DAZN user, the DAZN app will not be available to install from the LG Netcast TV store.

When will the DAZN app on Netcast TV stop working?
On 12th May 2021 globally.

Will you give me advance notice before ending LG Netcast TV support?
Yes we will email you about the end of support 30 days and 7 days in advance of the end date, besides notifying you each time you launch the DAZN app on LG Netcast TV during that period.

Globally

What other devices can I watch DAZN on?
You will still be able to watch DAZN on any of our wide selection of platforms across Smart TVs, Set Top Boxes, Game Consoles, mobile devices and web browsers.

Title: Pulse
Content:
What is Pulse?
Pulse keeps you up to date with what’s happening in the football while you’re watching or browsing DAZN. You can choose games you want to receive updates for and Pulse will send you interactive alerts when key moments in the game, like goals or penalties, happen. If you click on the alert, it’ll take you straight to the live stream of that game.

How do I use Pulse?
When live football matches become available to watch on DAZN, a red icon will appear towards the top right of your screen. If you click on this icon, it'll open a menu that displays all of the football matches that are happening live or soon due to kick off. You can use this menu to select the matches you want to receive alerts for.
You'll get Pulse alerts by default for matches related to any footbal teams or competitions that you have followed. If you want to switch any of these off, you can manage your alerts in Settings under 'Following'.



Can I manage which types of alert I can receive?
Yes, you can customise alerts via the red Pulse icon. By default, you'll get alerts for goals, penalties and red cards. You can change the key moments you get alerts for in the Pulse menu - select 'manage alerts'.

You can set up alerts for any or all of the following key moments:
  • Goals
  • Red cards
  • Penalties
  • Hit the post or crossbar
  • Match start / end
When will I receive alerts?
The second a key moment occurs in one of the matches you're following, you’ll see an alert pop up at the top right of your screen (see below). Click on the alert and your stream will instantly switch to that game. Your new stream will start just before the key moment, so you can watch the build-up too.
If you decide not to switch, you can click the ‘x’ on the alert. If you do nothing, the alert will disappear automatically after 15 seconds.



How can I return to what I was watching before?
Once you’ve caught up on the action, you can either carry on watching that game or switch back to what you were watching before. You’ll see an option at the bottom left of the video to go back to the previous stream. If you want continue watching the new match, you can dismiss the ‘Back’ option by selecting the ‘x’.

What can I watch on Pulse?
Pulse is only available for football.

When does Pulse become available for a live football game on DAZN?
You can choose to receive Pulse alerts for a match up to an hour before the game is due to kick off. For any matches you choose to receive Pulse alerts for, you’ll start seeing alerts from the point at which the match kicks off.

How can I avoid spoilers?
Pulse alerts only tell you about the type of moment that's happened and the match it’s happened in. It doesn’t tell you which team’s involved.

Also, we don’t show Pulse alerts for the match you are currently watching. So if you’re watching a game, you won’t get any notifications about what’s coming up – so you won’t get any spoilers.

Title: Where can I purchase gift codes?
Content:
What are DAZN prepaid codes or gift cards?
  • DAZN prepaid cards or codes can be used as a payment method for the DAZN PLUS subscription without using an online credit card or as a gift.
  • DAZN prepaid cards or codes entitle you to the DAZN PLUS plan for the number of months indicated.
  • DAZN prepaid cards or codes are valid for 12 months from the date of purchase.
  • DAZN prepaid cards or codes can only be used in the country in which they were purchased.
  • DAZN prepaid cards or codes are non-refundable. After applying a prepaid code to an account, you can watch DAZN PLUS until the prepaid period runs out.

What plan do I have access to via a DAZN prepaid card or code?

DAZN prepaid cards and codes give you access to the DAZN PLUS plan.

Where can I get a DAZN prepaid code?

At this moment you can get a DAZN prepaid code in one of the following ways:
  • Digital Prepaid Cards: Startselect, Amazon, Euronics and GameStop.
  • Prepaid Cards: available for purchase at Mediaworld, Unieuro, Euronics, Expert, Trony, Comet, Esselunga, Carrefour, Coop, Bennet, Penny Market and GameStop.
  • Prepaid Codes: can be purchased at Mooney e PuntoLis stores, or in a welfare programme of your company.
  • Special Codes: occasionally you may find prepaid codes in addition to a product offered by a partner or as a prize in a contest.

How do I redeem a DAZN prepaid code?

To redeem a prepaid code, follow these instructions:
  1. Go to www.dazn.com/redeem
  2. Gently scratch the silver cover on the back of the card and discover your code (If you have a code on your receipt, the code to use is that.)
  3. Enter the code in the space provided and confirm.

Once you have entered the code correctly, follow the on-screen procedure to create a new account or access an existing one. Depending on the prepaid code used, you may be asked to enter an additional payment method.

If you purchased the DAZN prepaid card in the store, adding an additional payment method is always optional.

N.B.: There are cases in which the code can only be used by certain types of customers. For example, some codes can only be used by new customers. Always read the information about the prepaid code to know the applicable conditions. If in doubt, contact Customer Service, attaching a photo of your prepaid code.

Can I use a prepaid card or code if I already have a current DAZN subscription?
  • If you have an ongoing DAZN PLUS subscription you can immediately apply the prepaid card or code. Your prepaid period will begin at the end of the current billing cycle.
  • If you have a current DAZN Standard subscription and activate a prepaid card or code, the new DAZN PLUS prepaid subscription will start immediately. The duration of the DAZN PLUS subscription to which you will have access will correspond to the months of the card or prepaid code entered. Otherwise, you have two options:
1. Make the switch to DAZN PLUS through the procedure in the "My Account" area. In this case you will pay a first subscription installment of € 44.99, discounted by the remaining credit on your previously active standard DAZN subscription. At this point, you can insert the DAZN prepaid card or code, and your prepaid period will start at the end of the current billing cycle.

2. Cancel the current subscription (active via credit card or PayPal) and wait for the account to be closed with the relative confirmation via email. At this point it is possible to reactivate the subscription using the card or the prepaid code"

Can I use a prepaid card or code if I am paying for the subscription through a third party?
  • If you are paying through a third party (Apple iTunes, Amazon In App Payment, Google) to apply a DAZN prepaid code you will have to cancel the subscription in progress, wait for the account to be closed with the relative confirmation via email, also from DAZN, and reactivate the subscription using the prepaid code.
  • If you have a package that includes DAZN, billed by a third party you can keep the prepaid code and use it when the account is no longer linked to a third-party package or apply it to another DAZN account.


Can I cancel my account while using a prepaid code or gift card?

Once a prepaid code has been activated, your access to DAZN PLUS will be guaranteed until the prepaid period ends.

 What happens to my account when the card or prepaid code expires?
  • If you have not entered an additional payment method (credit card or PayPal) on your account, your DAZN PLUS subscription will expire at the end of the prepaid period.
  • If you have entered an additional payment method on your account, at the end of your prepaid period your DAZN PLUS subscription will automatically renew every month at 49,99€ per month. You can cancel it whenever you want by selecting "Cancel subscription" from "My Account".

Can I change my payment method while using the prepaid code or gift card?

You can change your payment method by going to the "My Account" section. The new payment method entered will be activated when the current prepaid period expires. In case of problems, contact Customer Service.

Can I change the subscription plan if I am paying by card or prepaid code?
  • No, the prepaid code gives you access to the DAZN PLUS plan until the expiry of the prepaid period.
  • If you have not entered an additional payment method on your account, your DAZN PLUS subscription will expire at the end of the prepaid period. At this point you can reactivate your subscription, using a credit card or PayPal, in the ""my Account"" area by choosing the plan you prefer.

Can't redeem your DAZN prepaid code?

If you are unable to redeem your DAZN prepaid code, you may find yourself in one of these situations:

The prepaid code has not been entered correctly: 

Check that you have entered the prepaid code correctly and try typing it again.

Be careful:
  • If you have purchased a DAZN prepaid card or code, your code will be 15 characters long.
  • All DAZN codes are case sensitive.

Do not confuse:

A capital "o" (O) and the number zero (0)

A lowercase "L" (l), an uppercase "i" (I) and the number one (1)

If you entered the code correctly but continue to display an error message, contact Customer Service.

Your profile may not have the correct characteristics to use the code:

Check that your account is not linked to a payment through a third party (Apple iTunes, Amazon In

App Payment, Google) and that your subscription is not part of a third party billed plan. For more information see the point "Can I use a prepaid code if I am paying for the subscription through a third party"

Check that the code is not dedicated exclusively to certain categories of customers on the terms and conditions received with the code. For example, some codes can only be used by new customers.

If the problem persists, please contact our Customer Service.

The prepaid code could be expired. 

The error message you are receiving may mean that the 12 months have elapsed after which it is no longer possible to redeem the code.

Check the expiration date of your code on the receipt or contact Customer Service.

Check the terms and conditions of the DAZN prepaid codes.

The prepaid code could have been purchased or issued in a country that is different to the one in which you are trying to activate it. 

What happens if I have a prepaid DAZN code purchased before 02/08/2022?

All DAZN prepaid cards and codes can be activated within 12 months from the date of purchase and give access to the DAZN PLUS plan.

What happens if I already have an active subscription through a prepaid DAZN code with expiration after 02/08/2022?

Starting from 02/08/2022 you will automatically have access to the DAZN PLUS plan until the expiry of the prepaid period.
  • If you have not entered an additional payment method (credit card or PayPal) on your account, your DAZN PLUS subscription will expire at the end of the prepaid period.
  • If you have entered an additional payment method on your account, at the end of your prepaid period your DAZN PLUS subscription will automatically renew every month at 49,99€ per month. You can cancel it whenever you want by selecting "Cancel subscription" from "My Account".

Can I use a voucher in conjunction with an annual subscription?

Yes, if it is an annual subscription with prepayment paid by PayPal, Klarna, credit card or standard direct debit. Unfortunately, it is not currently possible to use a voucher in conjunction with an annual subscription that is paid monthly.
 
 ITALY - General Conditions for prepaid cards and gift codes 

Valid from 24 December 2021.

1. ABOUT US

We are a subscription service that provides subscribers with access to a wide range of sports events from around the world streamed to a range of devices including Internet-connected TVs, computers, and other platforms ("DAZN Service"). To enhance the enjoyment of the DAZN Service, we also provide recommendations of broadcasts users might be interested in and other interesting sports information.

The DAZN Service is provided by DAZN Limited (“DAZN”).

2. PREPAID CARDS AND GIFT CODES

1. Prepaid cards (“Cards” or, individually, “Card”) and gift codes (“Codes” or, individually, “Code”) are issued by DAZN and can be purchased at authorized third-party stores or via any other ad hoc methods specified.
2. Cards and Codes can be activated within twelve months from the date of purchase, can be used only once and, subject to the conditions in point 3 below, allow access to the DAZN Service at the price and for the validity period of the Card or Code purchased.
3. In order to use Cards or Codes, the buyer (“User”) must: a) create a new DAZN account – only if 18 years old and after accepting the DAZN Service conditions of use (“Conditions of Use”) and after reading and accepting the privacy policy on www.dazn.com – or already have an account with a direct payment method to DAZN; b) have a device that supports the DAZN Service and an internet connection with the minimum connectivity requirements, and the supported devices listed on www.dazn.com or in the Conditions of Use.
4. Cards and Codes are non-refundable and can only be used in Italy.

3. EXPIRY AND RENEWAL

3.1 After a Card or Code has been activated, without prejudice to the provisions in article 3.2, letter b), below, access to the DAZN Service – and the relevant user account – will be guaranteed until the expiry date of the Card or Code.
3.2. If during the activation of the Card or Code, as provided in article 3 above:
a) the User has not entered the payment details for one of the methods available, access to the DAZN Service will end on the date the Card or Code expires.
b) the User has entered the payment details for one of the payment methods available, access to the DAZN Service will be renewed every month at DAZN Service's normal price, which will be automatically debited when the Card or Code expires and then every month thereafter, using the payment details provided by the User when they opened their DAZN account.
3.3 User may request to cancel the automatic renewal at any time using one of the following methods:
1.    by logging into “My Account” LINK (URL: https://my.dazn.com/it-IT/myaccount/subscription/cancel) and clicking on "Cancel Subscription”.
2.    by contacting Customer Services at the LINK (URL: https://dazn.com/help?chat=direct);
3.    by sending a clear request to this effect to DAZN Limited, Piazza San Babila n. 3, 20122 Milan (MI).

4. LOST, DESTROYED, OR UNREADABLE CARDS AND CODES

4.1. The risk of accidental loss, destruction, or illegibility of Codes or Cards passes to the User at the time of the purchase. The User is solely responsible for preserving and using the Card or Code and for any proper and/or improper use that may be made of it.
4.2. DAZN shall not be responsible for the theft, loss, or unauthorized use of Cards or Codes.

5. PERMITTED USE

Cards and Codes may only be used for their permitted use. The User therefore undertakes not to use them in any way that violates any applicable local, national, or international law or regulation and/or in any illegal or fraudulent manner, nor for illegal or fraudulent purposes or effects.

6. AMENDMENTS

DAZN will notify Users of any amendments to these Conditions at their most recent registered email address. Any changes to payment conditions will also by directly notified to Users via the same method. These notifications will clearly state the changes and the relevant reasons as well as the period of sixty (60) days, starting from the date of the notification, within which Users may withdraw from the contract if they do not wish to accept the amendments. If the User does not notify the intention of withdrawing from the contract within the deadline, the amendments will be deemed accepted. However, by way of derogation, any amendments to comply with laws and regulations, even in the event of changes in the law, can have immediate effect.

Title: How to update your payment method
Content:
Please select which payment method you are currently using:
  • I am directly subscribed to DAZN
  • I am subscribed to DAZN via Apple
  • I am subscribed to DAZN via Amazon in app payment

How to change your payment method being directly subscribed to DAZN (back to top)
Please follow the steps below to change your payment method:
  • On your web browser please navigate to www.dazn.com (The easiest way to update your payment method is using a web browser on a PC, or MacBook)
  • Please click now on “Sign in” (If you are already signed in click here)
  • Enter your login details and click on “Start Watching”
  • Once the DAZN page loads go to the upper right corner, click on “Menu” and afterwards on “My Account”
  • You will need to enter your login details again.
  • Scroll down to the payment method section and click on “Change payment method”
  • Now select your preferred payment method, enter your details and click on save. 
  • Once your new details are saved we will deduct your new monthly payment from the new payment method (If you want to switch your payment method to Apple, or Amazon in app payment you will need to cancel the subscription in the “My account” section and reactivate via Amazon/Apple once your subscription runs out).

How to change your payment details being subscribed to DAZN via Apple (back to top)
You will need to update your Apple payment method in order to pay for DAZN via Apple with your new payment method. For detailed instructions on how to do this please click here for the Apple support page.

If you would like to change your payment method to DAZN or Amazon in app payment you will need to cancel your subscription via Apple and reactivate via DAZN or Amazon in app payment once your subscription runs out.

How to change your payment details being subscribed to DAZN via Amazon in app payment (back to top)
You will need to update your Amazon payment method in order to pay for DAZN via Amazon in app payment with your new payment method. For detailed instructions on how to do this please click here for the Amazon support page.

If you would like to change your payment method to DAZN or Apple you will need to cancel your subscription via Apple and reactivate via DAZN or Apple once your subscription runs out.

Title: What can I do if my payment failed?
Content:
Click the topic to get to the section:
  • Check your bank account balance
  • Payment address must match the country you're accessing DAZN from
  • Update your payment method and details
  • Check with your bank or payment provider
Check your bank account balance (Back to top)
You must have a minimum amount in your bank account or on your card in order to pay for DAZN. We will only take money if there are enough funds to pay for your subscription and we do check to ensure that you have sufficient funds. Check the funds in your account or available balance on your card.

Payment address must match the country you're accessing DAZN from (Back to top)
Please check to ensure that the billing address attached to your bank account or card is in the same country that you are accessing DAZN from. For example, if you are accessing DAZN from Germany, your bank account used for sign up must also have a billing address based in Germany.

Update your payment method and details (Back to top)
If your payment failed you want to check if you provided the correct payment details and update your payment method if necessary. You can do this in the "My Account" section. Once you have signed in, you will need to scroll down until you come to the payment section. Here you can check and update your payment method if necessary.

Check with your bank or payment provider (Back to top)
Sometimes your payment provider may decline the transaction. Please contact your payment provider directly to check that the transaction went through, and then try again.

Contact customer support
If you run into further problems with your payment please contact our customer service team for further help.

Title: NFL Game Pass - How many devices can I connect?
Content:
You can watch games, shows and more with NFL Game Pass on 5 different devices at the same time using the same internet network. 
 

If you’re having issues watching on two or three devices, make sure they are all coming from the same internet connection – for example, if you are watching NFL content on your TV that is connected to your home Wi-Fi and you want to watch on your mobile phone as well, your phone needs to be connected to your Wi-Fi, not your mobile data network.
 

 You can register up to 5 devices to watch on. To register your device, you just need to start watching, or manage your devices in "My Account".

Title: How do I sign up for DAZN?
Content:
Please choose below how you would like to sign up for DAZN:
  • Sign up using your web browser
  • Sign up using your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV
  • Sign up using your Android phone, or tablet
  • Sign up using your Amazon device
  • Sign up using your Smart TV, or Gaming console
  • What to do if you run into problems during sign up

Sign up for DAZN using your web browser (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN account using your web browser:
  • On the DAZN homepage click on "Sign up"
  • Next you will need to enter your personal details for your account. Please make sure to double check your email address. Once you have entered all your details, click on continue.
  • Once you click on continue you will access the payment page. If you have a gift code available make sure to enter this first and click on “apply”. You will get a notification that your gift has been successfully redeemed
  • Afterwards choose your preferred payment method and enter your payment details.
  • Click on "Start Subscription" which will bring you to a payment overview page.
  • Congratulations, you have successfully subscribed to DAZN.

Sign up for DAZN using your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN Account on your Apple device:
  • On your iPhone/iPad home screen start your DAZN app
  • Click on the Sign up button
  • Fill out your personal information for your Account and click on "Start Watching"
  • Confirm your payment via iTunes for your DAZN account
  • Please note that you can access DAZN on any device using your DAZN credentials created

Sign up using your Android phone, or tablet (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN account using your web browser:
  • On your Android phone, or tablet home screen start your DAZN app
  • Click on the Sign up button
  • Fill out your personal information for your account and click on "Start Watching"
  • You will get a summary page where you need to confirm your payment.
  • A pop up window will open, where you need to confirm your payment via Google Play Billing. Once this is confirmed your account was successfully created.
  • Please note that you can access DAZN on any device using your DAZN credentials created
Sign up for DAZN using your Amazon device (back to top)
To sign-up with your Amazon device you must be located in Japan, Germany, Austria or Canada. Your 1-Click Payment Method must also correspond to the same country you are accessing DAZN from. Note that German and Austrian customers can use cross-border payment method via Amazon.
  • On your Amazon device launch the DAZN app and select to sign up.
  • Create an account with DAZN and confirm your email marketing preferences. Please note that your DAZN account is different from your Amazon account, regardless of the email address used and you can use the DAZN account to watch DAZN on any supported device.
  • Amazon’s standard in-app subscription popup will be displayed, sumarising information about your plan.
  • Confirm your subscription to complete sign-up.
  • Amazon’s standard confirmation popup will be displayed.
  • Click ‘Done’ and start watching DAZN.
  • Please note that you can access DAZN on any device using your DAZN credentials created.

Sign up using your Smart TV, or Gaming console (back to top)
Please follow the steps to sign up for a DAZN account using your Smart TV, or Gaming console:
  • On your device please navigate to the DAZN app and start it.
  • Once your app is loaded click on the "Sign up" button.
  • You get on the first page of the sign up, please fill in the requested details.
  • In the last step you need to choose your preferred payment method and enter your payment details. With a click on "Start Subscription" you will be successfully signed up for DAZN.
What to do if you run into problems during sign up?(back to top)
  • If you run into problems during your sign up please contact our customer service team. We will be happy to help you complete your sign up.

Title: Recovering your email address
Content:
If you’ve forgotten your email address, it’s easy to recover it in a few steps.

 

 Finding the email you used to sign up with

  1. Search your inbox for any emails from us. The email might have been sent a few months or years ago, depending on when you signed up.
  2. Check for any saved passwords in your browser or password manager. You might find that, although the password is out of date or incorrect, the email address is right.
  3. Try each email address you have if you’ve ever created more than one DAZN account.
  4. If you’ve found the right email address, reset your password so you can access your account. You can reset your password here.
  5. Once you’re signed in, remember to update your email address in My Account.

 

Recovering your email address

If you can’t find the email address you used to sign up, we may be able to help. Reach out to customer support with as many of the below details as possible. This can help us track down your account.

  • First and last name
  • Payment method
  • Last 4 digits of your payment method if applicable
  • Giftcode number if you have one
  • Date you signed up

 

Still stuck?

If you’ve tried all the above and you’re still having problems, reach out to customer support.

Title: What can I do if my video is buffering or I see a spinning circle?
Content:
When troubleshooting streaming or rebuffering issues DAZN finds that it is often due to poor connectivity with your home network. Below are a few suggestions on how to improve your overall streaming experience.
  1. Try another event and see if it works
  2. Please go to http://www.fast.com and check that your internet connection speed meets our minimum requirements.
  3. If possible, connect your device with an ethernet cable to your router or modem
  4. Reduce the number of devices using your wi-fi network
  5. Restart your modem and/or router
  6. Confirm that other streaming apps are working
  7. Confirm the latest operating system is installed
  8. Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN app
  9. Restart your device
Additional steps for your web browser:
  1. Delete cookies and cache
  2. Try a different web browser
If you are still having problems, we suggest that you contact your internet service provider to discuss your home network connectivity to improve your streaming quality while watching DAZN

Title: Subscription Changes
Content:
How do I change my plan down a subscription level?  

If you pay for DAZN directly you can change to a lower plan by logging into ‘My Account’. Under the ‘Manage Subscription’ section, select ‘Change Plan’ to speak to one of our experts who can find the right plan for you.  

However, if you pay for your DAZN subscription via a third party, such as Google or Apple, to change subscription plan you will have to access the subscription section in your relevant app store.  

 

Can I change my plan down at any time?  

If you are on a monthly (30 day) subscription, you can request to change your plan to a lower subscription at any time by speaking to one of our experts.  If you have an annual plan either by paying upfront or in monthly instalments, you can do this within the last 90 days of your current subscription period.  

You can change your plan via the Manage Subscription section of My Account, selecting ‘Change Plan’ to speak to one of our experts.  

 

Will my plan change take effect immediately?  

Any plan change to a lower plan will come into effect at the next renewal date of your current subscription. If you pay monthly, this will be on the next monthly billing date. For annual subscriptions, paying upfront or in monthly instalments, any plan change will come into effect at the end of the annual contract.  

Your plan will remain unchanged until your renewal date. You can continue to access your current plan details, payment & billing information, and other subscription details within the subscription tab in My Account. Your new plan details will be reflected only at your next subscription renewal date.  

 

What if I change my mind?  

You can cancel your plan change via ‘My Account’ at any time up until the day before your subscription renewal date. Simply select one of the ‘Cancel Plan Change’ options in the subscription tab of ‘My Account.’  If you cancel the change, you will stay on the same plan you are currently on. It can take a few minutes for your account to show this change.  

 

Are there other ways I can change my plan down?  

From time to time, we may inform you of the offers on our products and services that may result in your plan moving to a lower subscription level. Any change in plan down will be reflected at your subscription renewal date.  

 

Can I still make changes to my subscription whilst my change down is in progress?  

Whilst your plan is in the process of being changed, we will limit some capability in My Account such as Change Plan upgrade and changing how you pay for your subscription.  

To get access to these features you would first need to cancel your change plan down via My Account before you can make further changes to your subscription.

Title: Pulse
Content:
What is Pulse?
Pulse keeps you up to date with what’s happening in the football while you’re watching or browsing DAZN. You can choose games you want to receive updates for and Pulse will send you interactive alerts when key moments in the game, like goals or penalties, happen. If you click on the alert, it’ll take you straight to the live stream of that game.

How do I use Pulse?
When live football matches become available to watch on DAZN, a red icon will appear towards the top right of your screen. If you click on this icon, it'll open a menu that displays all of the football matches that are happening live or soon due to kick off. You can use this menu to select the matches you want to receive alerts for.
You'll get Pulse alerts by default for matches related to any footbal teams or competitions that you have followed. If you want to switch any of these off, you can manage your alerts in Settings under 'Following'.



Can I manage which types of alert I can receive?
Yes, you can customise alerts via the red Pulse icon. By default, you'll get alerts for goals, penalties and red cards. You can change the key moments you get alerts for in the Pulse menu - select 'manage alerts'.

You can set up alerts for any or all of the following key moments:
  • Goals
  • Red cards
  • Penalties
  • Hit the post or crossbar
  • Match start / end
When will I receive alerts?
The second a key moment occurs in one of the matches you're following, you’ll see an alert pop up at the top right of your screen (see below). Click on the alert and your stream will instantly switch to that game. Your new stream will start just before the key moment, so you can watch the build-up too.
If you decide not to switch, you can click the ‘x’ on the alert. If you do nothing, the alert will disappear automatically after 15 seconds.



How can I return to what I was watching before?
Once you’ve caught up on the action, you can either carry on watching that game or switch back to what you were watching before. You’ll see an option at the bottom left of the video to go back to the previous stream. If you want continue watching the new match, you can dismiss the ‘Back’ option by selecting the ‘x’.

What can I watch on Pulse?
Pulse is only available for football.

When does Pulse become available for a live football game on DAZN?
You can choose to receive Pulse alerts for a match up to an hour before the game is due to kick off. For any matches you choose to receive Pulse alerts for, you’ll start seeing alerts from the point at which the match kicks off.

How can I avoid spoilers?
Pulse alerts only tell you about the type of moment that's happened and the match it’s happened in. It doesn’t tell you which team’s involved.

Also, we don’t show Pulse alerts for the match you are currently watching. So if you’re watching a game, you won’t get any notifications about what’s coming up – so you won’t get any spoilers.

Title: How fast does my Internet need to be to watch DAZN in HD?
Content:
DAZN provides high-quality video streaming. It automatically selects the best video quality available for your device and internet connection speed. 

All DAZN programmes and live streams are available in 1080p Full High Definition, which means that as long as you have an internet speed of around 16mbps, you should experience the highest quality of definition.
However, to watch DAZN on your TV and laptop in HD (High Definition), we recommend an internet download speed of 9mbps and to watch in SD (Standard Definition), we recommend an internet download speed of 3mbps.



How to find out your internet download speed

To check your internet speed, go to Misurainternet .

Important considerations when watching sport streamed over the internet: Please also visit our troubleshoot your network connection help article which offers you some quick fixes for the most common problems and a quick and easy guide on how to test your internet connection speed.”
  1. Sometimes your device cannot use 100% of the available internet download speed. When this is the case you'll need up to 100% ore bandwidth to achieve the best quality possible.
  2. When someone else on your network uses the internet, it will reduce the available bandwidth for you to watch sport on DAZN.
  3. We do not support VPNs (Virtual Private Networks) or Proxys. Please remove these before attempting to watch DAZN.

Title: Which browsers does DAZN support?
Content:
DAZN supports the web browsers listed below on their latest version. If your version is not current, please click on your web browser on the list for updating steps:
  • Google Chrome
  • Mozilla Firefox
  • Microsoft Edge
  • Apple Safari
How to update Google Chrome 
1.    Open Chrome.
2.    At the top right, click on the three dots. If an update is pending, the icon will be colored:
•    Green: An update has been available for 2 days.
•    Orange: An update has been available for 4 days.
•    Red: An update has been available for 7 days.
3.    Click Update Google Chrome - If you don't see this button, you're on the latest version.
4.    Click Relaunch.

How to update Mozilla Firefox
1.    Open Firefox.
2.    Click the menu button > Help > About Firefox. Firefox will begin checking for updates and downloading them automatically.
3.    When the updates are ready to be installed, click Restart Firefox.

How to update Microsoft Edge 
Your Microsoft Edge browser is automatically updated through the Windows 10 updates system. To check if there are updates available for Windows 10, please follow these steps:
1.    Click on the Windows logo in the lower left corner.
2.    Click on Settings > Update & Security > Check for updates. If an update for Windows 10 is available, it will be installed automatically and you will get the latest version of Edge.

How to update Apple Safari 
You can keep your Safari browser up to date by making sure that your macOS is up to date. Please follow the guide on the Apple support page to update your macOS.

Contact customer support
If the troubleshooting steps did not help you solve your problem please contact our customer service team for further help.

Title: Resetting your DAZN password
Content:
If you’re struggling to remember your password, or you need to reset it for security reasons, this article can help you through the process.

 

How to reset your password
 

1. Go to our ‘forgotten password’ recovery page. You can find this on the sign in page – just click ‘Forgot your password?’

2. Enter your email address and select ‘Send’.
  • You’ll then receive an email with a link. The email will come from DAZN Password Reset, with the subject Lost your password?’.
  • Make sure to check your junk or spam folder too.
3. Select the ‘Reset password’ button in the email.
  • This will take you to a new page in your browser, where you can set a new password.
  • Follow our guidance for setting a secure password below.
  • You’ll need to enter your password twice, then click ‘Change password’.
  • If your password reset link takes you to the DAZN sign in page, try clearing the cookies or cache on your device. Cookies keep a track of the websites you visit and your online activity, and your cache stores temporary information, to help reduce loading times. Find out how to clear your cookies and cache here.
  • If this doesn’t work, reach out to customer support using the link below.
4. Your password has been updated. You’ll receive an email to confirm that your password has changed.

5. Sign into DAZN using your new password.

 

You’ll need to sign in again on any device you use DAZN on. That’s because resetting your password will sign you out of your account for safety reasons.

 

Creating a secure password


Making sure your password is secure is the best way to keep your account safe.

Do

  • Make your password at least 8 characters long. We’d recommend 10 characters or more for extra safety
  • Use numbers, special characters (!?:&*), upper and lowercase characters to make your password harder to guess
  • Use passphrases, such as picking three random words and writing them with a variety of characters.

Don’t

  • Use your name, email or other personal information
  • Make small changes to old passwords and use a slightly updated version of that password
  • Use a password you’ve used anywhere else.
What to do if you don’t receive your password reset email


It can take up to 15 minutes for your password reset email to come through. If you don’t receive it, check your junk or spam folders.

If you still haven’t received the email, make sure you’re using the same email address you used to sign up to DAZN. You can check this by searching your inbox for any other emails from DAZN, such as a subscription confirmation.
 

See how to recover your email address here.
 

If you still haven’t received your password reset and you’re sure it’s the right email address, reach out to customer support using the link below.
 

What to do if your password reset link won’t work

 

If you receive a password reset email and the link won’t work, this may be because the link has expired.

You can try resetting your password again and use the new email you receive. If the link still won’t work, reach out to customer support.

 

 

Still stuck?

If you’re having any other problems resetting your password, reach out to customer support.

Title: I cannot log in / sign in to DAZN
Content:
Please follow the steps below if you have problems accessing your account:
  • Accessing "My Account"
  • At the sign in make sure to verify your login details / Error code 50-49-401.
  • Reset your password.
  • Recover your email address
  • Restart your device.
  • Contact customer support.

Accessing "My Account" (back to top)
After your registration it may take up to 4 hours until you are able to access "My Account". Otherwise you should be able to access "My Account" at any time using this link.

At the sign in make sure to verify your login details (error code 50-49-401) (back to top)
When you try to sign in make sure to check your email address and password for typos and make sure to use the details you entered when registered. If you have entered your wrong login details you will receive a banner stating error code 50-49-401. If you have entered the wrong password for more than 10 times in a row, you receive error code 50-00-429 and our system will log you out for approximately 15 minutes before you can try again to login. This is to protect your account and prevent an unauthorized person to gain access.

Reset your Password (back to top)
Please follow the steps below to reset your password:
  • Please use our password recovery function by following this link.
  • On the following page please enter your Email Address and click on “Send”.
  • You will receive a notification that we have sent an email to the email address entered.
    Please check your inbox and spam folder of your email account for an email from “DAZN support” with the subject “Change your password”. Please take into consideration that it can take some time for the password reset email to arrive.
  • In your mail from DAZN you will find a “Reset Password” button. Please click this now.
  • You will be redirected to a new page where you can enter your new password. Make sure to follow the below criteria for your new password:
    • Contains at least one uppercase and lowercase letter.
    • No spaces in the password allowed.
    • Contains at least one letter and one number.
    • You will need to verify your password to make sure there is no typo in your password. Once you have selected and entered your new password please click on “Change Password”.
  • Once you have changed your password you can use your new password to sign in to DAZN.

Recover your email address (back to top)
Please take this link to recover your email address. In order to recover your email address you will need the following details:
  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Payment method
  • Last 4 digits of your payment method

Restart your device (back to top)
Depending on your device the steps might be different. As a general guideline you can close the app and power your device off, if it doesn’t have a restart option. Afterwards please wait 10 to 20 seconds before you start your device again.

Contact customer support (back to top)
If you are still not able to access your account, please contact customer service for further help. To verify your account please provide the following information when contacting customer service:
  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Email
  • Last 4 digits of your credit card and expiry date
  • Voucher Code number (if you have one)
  • Sign up date

Title: Apple subscription access
Content:
If you subscribed to DAZN via Apple iOS device or iTunes and you are having trouble logging in, please follow these restore purchase steps to gain access: 

Restore subscription on "Sign in" page
  1. On a mobile iOS device make sure you are signed into your iTunes account which was used for DAZN subscription payment
  2. Open DAZN App and use "Sign in" button
  3. On "Sign in" page tap on "Restore purchase" button
  4. You will now be signed in and redirected to "Home" page

Restore subscription on "Sign up" page
  1. On a mobile iOS device make sure you are signed into your iTunes account which was used for DAZN subscription payment
  2. Open DAZN App and use "Sign up" button
  3. On "Sign up" page tap on "Restore purchase" button
  4. You will now be signed in and redirected to "Home" page

Please note: Active DAZN subscriptions will not receive a separate charge as a result of restoring purchase and your current billing date will remain the same.
If you still are having trouble with your account, please reach out to customer service.

Title: My email address is already in use?
Content:
If you get the error message that your email address is already in use, please go through the following steps:
 
  • Go to our sign in page and try to login with your email address and your password (You might have previously used that email address to register a DAZN account).
  • If this did not work, please request a new password using the password reset feature. You should receive an email with a link you can use to create a new password.
  • Once you have created a new password you should be able to sign in with your new password. If your account was cancelled in the past you need to enter your bank details to reactivate your subscription.
  • If you did not receive the link to create yourself a new password, or you are still unable to sign in with your account please contact customer support for further help.

Title: How do I change my personal details?
Content:
You can change your personal details anytime in My Account.

Once you are signed in you have the following options:
  • Change your name, e-mail, or password
  • Change your payment method, or cancel your subscription
  • Get an overview of your signed-in devices
  • Select your language preferences
  • Sign up and opt out of our newsletter

If you change your name, payment details or your password, we will send you a confirmation email.

Title: How to reactivate your account?
Content:
Please click on the topic below to see how you can reactivate your DAZN account:
  • How to reactivate your DAZN directly on www.dazn.com.
  • How to reactivate your DAZN account via Apple device.

Please follow the steps below if you want to reactivate your DAZN directly on www.dazn.com: (back to top)
  • Go to the DAZN main page and click on sign in.  
  • Once you have signed in, you will be redirected to our payment page. Please chose your payment methods and fill in your details.  
  • Confirm using the "Start subscription with obligation to pay" button
  • Congratulation, you have successfully reactivated your subscription

Please follow the steps below if you want to reactivate your DAZN account using your Apple device: (back to top)
  • Open the DAZN app on your iOS device.
  • Touch on "Sign in".  
  • Touch on restore purchase.  
  • When prompted, enter your Apple ID password and touch "OK".

Contact customer support
If you run into problems reactivating your accounts please contact our customer service team for further help.

Title: EU Portability
Content:
What is EU portability? 

EU portability means you can watch DAZN from your home country even when you’re abroad in other EEA  countries. For example, if you live in Italy and don’t want to miss your favourite sporting event, but you’re travelling in Austria where Italian sport isn’t available on DAZN, EU portability means you can still watch it.      

If you’re using DAZN in other countries with EU portability, you’ll see what you’d usually see at home. If you’re travelling outside the EU or don’t have EU portability, you’ll see live and on-demand sports that’s usually available in the country you’re in. This applies to Germany, Austria, Italy, Spain, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Liechtenstein the USA, Canada and Japan. 
      
Check if your subscription includes EU portability in My Account.  You can access My Account from anywhere. Just go to www.dazn.com. 
 
Countries with EU portability
If you’ve got EU  portability included in your subscription,    you can watch DAZN in any of the following countries. You’ll be able to watch the sports you’d see in your own country.   

•    Austria
•    Belgium
•    Bulgaria
•    Croatia
•    Republic of Cyprus
•    Czech Republic
•    Denmark
•    Estonia
•    Finland
•    France
•    Germany
•    Greece
•    Hungary
•    Iceland
•    Ireland
•    Italy
•    Latvia
•    Liechtenstein
•    Lithuania
•    Luxembourg
•    Malta
•    Netherlands
•    Norway
•    Poland
•    Portugal
•    Romania
•    Slovakia
•    Slovenia
•    Spain
•    Sweden. (-)
 


Troubleshooting EU portability

If you’re experiencing any issues with EU portability, some of these common troubleshooting tips might help.    
 
What to do if you've been denied EU portability
EU portability is controlled by specific regulations. When you sign up, your account will be subject to automatic checks. If you don’t have a valid, recurring payment method linked to your account, such as if you signed up with a code or gift card and didn’t add a payment method, you might be denied EU portability. 
We can’t manually adjust this after you’ve registered with us. To try and avoid this, make sure to add a valid payment method to your account when you sign up. 
How to access DAZN while you’re in another country
You can use DAZN as normal in other countries. If you’re already signed in, just open the app and start watching. If you’re not signed in, sign in through your browser or app and you can continue as normal.
Signing up to DAZN from other EU countries with EU portability
You’ll need to sign up to DAZN from the country where you live permanently. EU portability is currently available for EEA countries. 
DAZN account creation from other countries for customers that have DAZN included in their provider´s price
You will have to create a DAZN account in the country where you have signed up to DAZN through your provider
Where to download the DAZN app from
If you’re a Google Play Store user, you can download the DAZN app while on any network in a country where DAZN is available.
If you’re an App Store user, you can download the DAZN app if you’re logged into an Apple    account for any country where DAZN is live. 
We’d recommend installing the DAZN app before you travel. Or you can watch DAZN through your web browser in any EU country.
Resubscribing after a break with DAZN
If you’ve paused your subscription or are resubscribing after a cancellation, you won’t need to be verified when you reactivate your account. 
EU portability verification happens automatically when you resubscribe, so you won’t need to do anything.

Title: What can I do if my DAZN app doesn't start?
Content:
Summary:
In this article you will find troubleshooting steps if your DAZN app doesn't start.

From the list below please select the device you want to troubleshoot:
  • Web browser
  • PlayStation
  • Xbox
  • iPhone and iPad
  • Android Phone and Tablet
  • Samsung Smart TV
  • LG Smart TV
  • Sony Smart TV
  • Panasonic Smart TV
  • Android TV
  • Amazon Fire TV and Fire TV stick
  • Amazon Fire Tablet

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Web browser (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Web browser:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your PC/MAC has a working internet connection check if you can access www.dazn.com . If you can see the page and did not receive an error message you know that the internet connection on your PC/MAC is working.
  • Check your internet connection speed at www.fast.com
    On your web browser please navigate to www.fast.com to check your internet connection speed. As this page is optimized for streaming services it will get you an adequate picture of the speed of your internet connection. To review how fast your internet should be to watch DAZN please click here.
  • Try a different web browser
    Simply try to watch DAZN in another web browser. For a list of available web browser please check http://outdatedbrowser.com/. On this web page you can get the latest versions of available web browsers.
  • Delete cookies and cache
    Please navigate to our "How to delete your Cookies and Cache" article for more information in regards of the web browser you are using.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your PlayStation (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your PlayStation:
  • Confirm your internet connection is available on your device
    To check if your device has a working internet connection open your web browser on your device and visit www.dazn.com . If the page loads you know that your internet connection is working. Alternatively, you can visit the app store on your device to see if your device has a working internet connection. Alternatively you can open your app store to see if you can browse through it.
  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    Please follow the steps below:
    • For detailed instructions on how to update your operating system on your PlayStation 4: click here.
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your PSN Store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Restart your PlayStation
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Simply turn off your PlayStation.
    • Make sure to wait for 10 to 20 seconds
    • Start your PlayStation again.
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your PlayStation navigate to the DAZN app. On the DAZN app use the option button and select delete from the dropdown menu.
    • Go to the PSN store, search for DAZN and download the app again.
  • Connect Device with via cable
    Simply connect your device using an ethernet cable to your router. In this way you will eliminate any streaming issues due to poor Wi-Fi connection.

Please go through the following steps on your Xbox:

Alternatively, you can visit the app store on your device to see if your device has a working internet connection. Alternatively you can open your app store to see if you can browse through it.

  • Restart your Device
    Please follow the steps below:
    • Simply turn your Xbox off and unplug it from the power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Make sure to wait for 15 to 20 seconds before you plug it back in.
    • Afterwards turn the Xbox back on.
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application

    • Enter "DAZN" into the search function, open the app and install it again
  • Connect Device with via cable

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your iPhone, or iPad (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your iPhone, or iPad:
  • Try forceclosing the app
    Please go through the following steps:
    • On your home screen double tap the Home button
    • Swipe left and right until you find the DAZN app
    • Drag the DAZN app upwards from your home screen
    • Tap the Home button again
    • Navigate to the DAZN app and start it
  • Update your DAZN app
    Please go through the following steps:
    • On your device please navigate to the appstore
    • In the appstore click on the update button
    • Swipe your screen down to see if there are updates available for your apps
    • If there is an update for DAZN available you will see it in the list
    • Click on update to install the latest version of DAZN
  • Restart your Device
    Please check out the official Apple support page for detailed instruction on how to restart your device.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Lightly touch and hold the DAZN app until it jiggles
    • Tap "X" in the upper left corner of the app
    • Tap delete
    • Go to the app store
    • Enter "DAZN" into the search field
    • Click on the small cloud symbol next to the DAZN app
  • Confirm device is supported
    • iPhone 5, or newer
    • iPod Touch (5th Generation), or newer
    • iPad 2, or newer

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Android Phone, or Tablet (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Android Phone, or Tablet:
  • Try forceclosing the app
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Tap on the overview button (square button on the bottom of your screen)
    • Scroll through the apps until you find the DAZN app
    • Drag the app off the screen
    • Go to the home screen and restart on the DAZN app
  • Check for new updates of the DAZN app
    Please go to the Google Playstore and check if for an update of the DAZN app. If an update is available make sure to download the latest version of your App.
  • Restart your Device
    Please go through the steps below on your Android device:
    • In order to reboot your Android smartphone or tablet press down on the suspend button and hold it down for several seconds. You will find the suspend button is usually on the right side of the device just above the volume buttons.
    • After a few second you will see a menu. Select "Restart" from the menu if available, otherwise select "Power Off"
    • If your device doesn't restart automatically push and hold down on the suspend again until it restarts
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Open your device's Settings app
    • Tap "Apps & notifications"
    • Tap on the DAZN app (If you don't see it, first tap See all apps or App info)
    • Tap uninstall
    • Sign in to the Google Play Store (Ensure your device is connected to the internet)
    • Use the search function and enter "DAZN", or look in the sport section of the Google Play Store.
      You can also follow this link to the DAZN page on the Google Play Store.
    • Follow the instructions on your TV to install the DAZN app
  • Confirm device is supported
    Your Android Phone, or Tablet must be able to run operating systems 4.4 and above.

  • Check your IP address and comfirm it is located in a supported country
    On your web browser navigate to Maxmind. Once you are on the Maxmind page it will automatically show you where you are located according to the Maxmind database. Make sure that you are located in a supported country.
  • Confirm the latest operating system is installed
    Software updates automatically install on your Amazon Fire TV. If you want to manually check for a software update please go through the steps below:
    • From the Fire TV menu navigate to "Settings"
    • Select "Device"
    • Select "About"
    • Select "Check for System Updates"
    • If an update is available you will be able to install it now
  • Confirm that other streaming apps are working
    On your device please go to any other streaming app you have installed on your system and check if it works. If you don't have any other streaming app please check if your app store is working and you are able to browse through it.
  • Restart your Amazon Fire TV
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your Amazon Fire TV please navigate to the settings
  • Now you will need to go to "Device"
  • Navigate down to "Restart"
  • Your Fire TV will power off and automatically turn on again.
  • Restart your Router
    Please follow the steps below:
    • To restart your router please unplug your router or modem from its power outlet (don't just turn it off).
    • Wait 15-20 seconds, then plug it back in.
    • Allow the device a minute or two to turn back on.
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN application; ensure the latest version is downloaded.
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your Amazon Fire TV please navigate to the "Your apps and games" section
    • Make sure to scroll completely to the right and select "See all"
    • Once your app overview loads navigate to the DAZN app and click on the options button on your remote
    • Select "Uninstall" from the menu on the right side
    • Afterwards use the search function on the "Home" section and search for DAZN
    • Click on the DAZN app and follow the instructions to install the app
  • Connect Device with via cable
    Simply connect your device using an ethernet cable to your router. In this way you will eliminate any streaming issues due to poor Wi-Fi connection.

Troubleshoot your DAZN app issue on your Amazon Fire Tablet (back to top)
Please go through the following steps on your Amazon Fire Tablet:
  • Try force closing the app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your device tap the overview button (This button is usually located on the bottom of your screen and resembles often a simple square, or two rectangles overlapping each other)
    • Scroll through the apps until you find the DAZN app
    • Drag the app off the screen (This will close the app, but will not stop any background processes)
  • Update the DAZN app if possible
    Apps should automatically update on your Amazon Fire Tablet. If you want to check for manual updates please go through the steps below:
    • Tap the "Apps" tab
    • Tap the "Store" option
    • Tap the menu icon at the bottom of the store screen
    • Tap "My Apps"
    • Tap the "Update Available" tab
    • If your DAZN app has an update available it will have an "Update" button next to it
  • Restart your Fire Tablet
    Please go through the steps below:
    • Press and hold the Power button for 40 seconds or until the device restarts automatically
    • Once your device restarts release the power button
    • If your device doesn't restart automatically press the power button until it starts
  • Uninstall and reinstall the DAZN app
    Please follow the steps below:
    • On your Amazon Fire TV please navigate to the "Your apps and games" section
    • Make sure to scroll completely to the right and select "See all"
    • Once your app overview loads navigate to the DAZN app and click on the options button on your remote
    • Select "Uninstall" from the menu on the right side
    • Afterwards use the search function on the "Home" section and search for DAZN
    • Click on the DAZN app and follow the instructions to install the app
  • Confirm your Fire Tablet is supported
    For a list of supported Fire tablets please check the table below:
     4th Gen (2014)5th Gen (2015)6th Gen (2016)7th Gen (2017)
    Fire Fire (7") Fire (7")
    Fire HDFire HD (6")
